Name: Ayisa
Positive: Me and my partner loved everything about this hotel, especially the service! The staff were friendly and helpful with what ever we needed the breakfast was lovely also, especially the hot chocolate. I’m really happy that I booked this hotel & we will definitely be coming back. Thank you everyone at Novotel, we appreciate you!

Name: Lizzy
Positive:
WOW...
This hotel is honestly one of the best I’ve ever stayed in. From the moment we arrived, to the minute we checked out, everything was incredible 🤩
I’d booked it pretty last minute, for my boyfriend and I to celebrate his birthday. I emailed the hotel in advance to let them know it was a special occasion. Upon arriving at the hotel, one of the lovely ladies at reception (I didn’t catch her name) was so welcoming and told us everything we needed to know.
After checking in, we went up to our room on the 17th floor (1706). WOW x2! The room was spotlessly clean, and was honestly better than I could have ever hoped. The highlight was probably the amazing view of the city skyline. Seeing London at sunset, lit up at night and waking up to it in the morning was incredible.
Upon exploring the room, we came across a birthday card and caramel chocolate left for my boyfriend - such a nice touch. It sounds a bit odd, but we also couldn’t get over how nice the bathroom was! I mean the glass wall in the shower frosts with the touch of a button... we even took a video 😂
After checking in, we went down to use the pool. Again, everything was perfect. The changing rooms were so nice and clean and the pool was beautiful! Great temperature and the perfect way to unwind after travelling into Canary Wharf from Essex.
After using the pool, we came back up to our room to order a snack and a few drinks via room service. Great service again - the fries, along with a couple of beers, with our view of London went down a treat!
We didn’t visit the hotel restaurant (Bokan) for dinner, but we did go up to the bar later on that night. The service was impeccable once again, and the rooftop bar has the best 360 degree views of london 🥂
Honestly, don’t even hesitate to book this hotel!

Name: Jadon
Positive: Stayed in the executive suite, had an amazing view, nice room and 60 inch tv, was great for setting up my work station and looking at the chart.

Name: Halil
Positive: The hotel is lovely and clean and staff are so friendly and helpful. The restaurant and bar on the top floor has one of the best views of London. 10/10!!!

Bar food chicken teriyaki wasn’t cooked and potato skins where rock hard but spoke to staff and had complementary drink. Issue was I was actually hungry and wanted to have a main for me and my partner. Hope on the next visit it’s not the same as I enjoy my stay each time and will stay again

Negative:

Few toiletries, not even enough for both of us
Fridge and kettle were switched off - unable to get to sockets without pulling fridge out
No tables available for evening meal - we should have pre-booked but we didn't think we would need to.

Name: Gary
Review_title: No major faults but a few points make it less than the ideal hotel in the area.
Positive: Check in staff very good (Carlos). Breakfast staff top notch (sorry - no names). Room was very good (no complaints regarding comfort). Breakfast buffet was adequate and well-stocked (I wonder if omelettes were available?).
Negative: No hot water on day of departure. Not being able to have a warm shower, shave, shampoo, was a real let down. Location is a 15min walk from the centre of Canary Wharf activities and transport links (underground and DLR); ok for me, perhaps not so for the less fit or mobile.

Name: Andreea
Room_stayed: Superior Double Room with City View
Review_title: Amazing experience! breathless view over London :)
Positive:
I have stayed with my boyfriend. I booked a room with a view especially to celebrate his birthday. Everything was perfect. It was a small detail that they probably forgot, and that was, to put two glasses of wine in the room, but this would not change my opinion about the place. It is a very good area, an amazing view, absolutely breathless. I would like to thank you to France, who organised everything for me. You guys, are an amazing team! Keep it as you are! I work also in hospitality and I know what means to exceed client expectations and how hard it is. so...a massive THANK YOU to France and the whole Team, Novotel Canary Wharf. 
I will recommend this place to all my friends :) 
Warm regards, 
Andreea
Negative: I liked everything :). There is nothing to not like to this place. Even having breakfast/dinner/drink to the last floor, without booking a room in the hotel, would be the best decision ever. I just love this place. It became so close to my heart now and I started to go there from time to time with friends to have a drink in my days off. :)

Review_title: Staff Superb, Hotel Amazing, Thoroughly enjoyed my Stay
Positive:
Arrived early at the hotel and was greeted by the Manager, Tim i think his name was. His customer service is exceptional, I remember it from last time. Checked in, the room was lovely and the staff wherever I went were exceptional. Had a lovely snack in the bar, staff again were excellent, food was quite expensive but London isnt cheap overall anyway so expected as I work in london.
If you dont like heights like me, i would still recommend going to the bar for the views as well. 
Room was a Superior Room, bed was nice, nice view, tv, shower, fridge all mod cons.
Before I went home in the morning I went to Breakfast which was included in my package. The Breakfast is magnificient. so much choice! The whole hotel was clean, modern and staff in my view were the highlight.
Very happy stay, there wasnt any hot water in the morning in the whole hotel and staff apologised so I couldnt shower but that said way too many positives to stop me going back, its like home from home, fantastic!
Negative: The lack of hot water in the shower but sadly this was the whole hotel and I wouldnt mark the hotel down for it as it was unfortunate and didnt happen last time I went.

Name: Russell
Positive:
A great birthday night,
The only down side was the very very slow service at the bar around 10ish ( I waited around 20 mins standing directly on the bar with no one in front of me) for a drink I waited patiently and then made contact with one of the barstaff (one of four) who I assume were all busy making drinks for the restaurant and was replied with what do you think in doing I’m busy you’ll have to wait, not the response I was expecting and not good for and end to a great evening.
After another 10 mins I was served by another Barman and decided to retire to my room to prevent me from ruining a great night any further

Positive: Rooms were amazing, views were lush and the location was amazing

Review_title: Spacious, stylish and lovely all round.
Positive: I liked how big the room and bathroom was! I liked that you had toiletry bags next to the toilet. I enjoyed the branded tea and hot chocolate! I thought that was a nice touch. I also liked the free milk because you don't often get that with your tea. The water was very handy as well so that was appreciated. Lovely view from the 38th floor! It also smelled amazing in the lobby area when coming in.
Negative: If I had to choose one thing it would be that there was no mirror in the room (apart from bathroom). There was one in the wardrobe door but to be able to straighten and dry my hair I needed to stand at an awkward position to be able to see myself. Having a plug socket in the bathroom would have been handy with the bright mirror or having a mirror on the wall in the bedroom. The plug was around the corner from the wardrobe so it made styling my hair a bit awkward.

Name: Susan
Positive: Breakfast delicious, location perfect.

Name: Lisa
Positive: Absolutely fantastic views ! I asked the hotel to give us as good a room as they could for what we paid as it was for my husband's 60th and wow ! You did not disappoint. Make sure you visit the toilets in the bar and visit the roof terrace absolutely breathtaking and don't forget to check out the roof cam o. Your TV . Thank you . 😃🥰
Negative: The tea and coffee and sugar in the room was not replenished and yes we could have asked but we were tired and exhausted and wanted it right there and then.. No hotel information regarding check out times or pool opening times in the room.

Name: Katherine
Positive: Loved everything about our stay here, room very clean and beautiful, bed very comfortable, super friendly staff, option to have breakfast in our room was really nice. And the view from the 35th floor was amazing

Name: Kerry
Positive: Lovely stay, room was excellent so modern with a lovely comfy bed and huge tv, the rooftop bar was fantastic, the views of london while you relax!! Would definitely recommend and be back in the future

Name: Clémence
Positive: the amazing breakfast, the bed was so good, the view, the swimming pool it was super quiet

Name: Darren
Positive: The design of the hotel. The views were fabulous. The pool and sauna lovely.

Name: Jade
Positive: Breakfast in the room was lovely

Name: Karen
Positive: Staff were very friendly and efficient. Bar area is hip and contemporary and the views are amazing. The only downfall I felt at the hotel was the lack of food options for dinner. Very little variety, one page menu with only 4 or 5 main course options. But did not hamper our stay as there's lots of places to eat close by. Would definitely recommend and would definitely stay again.

Name: Hannah
Positive: Staff went above and beyond and made sure you had everything you needed. Complimentary chocolate and a birthday card were left for my partner as it was his birthday. Exceptional service

Name: Danendra
Positive: I love this hotel this is my second stay staff are very polite and attentive. I will always pick Novotel at any branch to stay at because they have really good facilities !
Negative: I got the executive suite I love the room size and the fact there is 2 toilets.

Name: Charlotte
Room_stayed: Superior Double Room with City View
Positive: As soon as myself and my partner arrived we was welcomed by a lovely lady who made us feel comfortable from the start. The room we was given was lovely & had a perfect view.

Name: Mistura
Positive: the breakfast was fantastic, with wonderful view

Name: Lucas
Positive:
Beautiful reataurant with outstanding view. Great tv and room.
Good swimming pool
Negative: Just problem with pipes in bathroom. They started smell very bad on the late evening

Name: Hannah
Positive: Customer service is amazing, a lady called Sara was so welcoming, smiley and energetic! I requested a room with city view and they did just that! Did not expect anything but was a great surprise. So thoughtful with adding little goodies to our stay, making my boyfriends birthday so enjoyable.
Negative: Only thing was the showers aren’t very powerful

Name: Alex
Positive:
Everything! 
The view, the pool, the location and the room were perfect!
Negative:
As wonderful as our dinner in the hotel restaurant was - it was quite pricy and we wanted just a quick and affordable bite to eat. We couldn’t eat in the bar as it jam packed with after work drinkers. 
It would have been great to choose another restaurant.

Name: Abi
Positive: The whole experience was faultless, the view from the room was amazing and for such a good price, highly recommend

Name: Sigurdur
Room_stayed: Superior Double Room with City View
Positive: Beautiful view, great staff, great rooms, just all good

Name: Lisa
Positive: Views were incredible we stayed in room 3006

Name: April
Positive: Smart, classy, comfortable, stunning views and lush roof top bar.

Name: Kate
Positive: Customer service was excellent. It was my other half’s birthday so they moved us to the best available room with a view on 29th floor. Excellent stay and room/view was brilliant.

Name: Nontsikelelo
Positive: The hotel smelt so good, had beautiful views and the staff was friendly. Totally loved the gym,pool and sauna.

Name: Andreas
Positive: Style and view

Name: Britney
Positive: Swimming pool & Shower!!
Negative: Drinks and the restaurants was more expensive than expected. Location of the hotel is far from central London

Name: April2774
Positive:
Lovely bright and modern hotel with a lovely rain shower. Nice view from the 24th floor. Very helpful staff with the ordering of taxis. Sadly didn't not get to enjoy the facilities due to a family emergency. Would book again though from what I saw.
Took me ages to find the full length mirror which was hidden inside the wardrobe!
Negative: Took me ages to find the full length mirror which was hidden in side the wardrobe!

Name: Rong
Positive: The view of Novotel is great! I have my birthday drink in the bar at the top level, and get a small surprise cake! very lovely!
Negative: we packed a food back to hotel, but there is no place to warm up, that's the only drawback we met during our trip:)

Name: Klaudiap
Room_stayed: Superior Double Room with City View
Positive: Great płace , highly recommend.

Name: Babou
Positive: The view was superb. And the food
Negative: May be the lights are a bit dark

Name: Margaret
Positive:
Excellent location for the o2. 
Staff were very helpful. 
Great breakfast with lots of choice.

Name: Konstantins
Room_stayed: Superior Double Room with City View
Review_title: Great hotel, nice and quite location and a stunning roof bar
Positive: Great hotel in general, have a nice bar/restaurant at the top floor. Rooms are nice and we were lucky to have room on the 27th floor. I love the fact dogs are allowed (for additional £25). I ordered food to my room, but it was delayed (took over an hour instead of 45min promised), but stuff was professional enough to give me a discount for this delay, so great service.
Negative:
Check-in was a bit long, stuff asked me to wait like 15min while they checking my room, but no one told me once it has been done, so I probably waited longer than I should and had to come back myself to ask again. Also, I haven't been told about the facilities, opening times etc.. No information at all and this is a second time at this hotel when I receive no information at check-in. You should tell your stuff on reception to give more information to the guests.
Also, the lifts aren't working well. Most of the times we had to wait like 5min to get downstairs, although there are about 6 lifts. Also, when we wanted to go from 38th floor (where the bar is) to our room (27th floor), we took last lift (the one on the far right) and in that lift we could not get anywhere apart from the ground floor, because that lift seems like is built for external restaurant visitors only. On the ground floor that lift doors open on the other side, so you can only go outside the hotel, not a reception, so that was really confusing and we had to go outside and come in via the main entrance. You should put a title above that lift to inform guests who are staying in hotel to not use it.

Name: Sathyabhama
Review_title: It was a short stay but amazing time none the less.
Positive: The breakfast was amazing. Staff was very friendly and helpful. They gave us good tips for places to visit.

Name: Emma
Review_title: Absolutely amazing the staff and hotel were beyond what I expected.
Positive: The hotel did everything they could to make it the best stay possible and it really was.

Name: Megan
Positive: The Novotel hotel never fails to amazing me with it’s beautiful views of London and the Thames. The staff are so polite and always happy to help. I have stayed at a number of hotels in London and this is most definitely my favourite.

Name: Georgia
Positive: Very modern and extremely well kept. Lots of friendly and helpful staff.

Name: Ceri
Positive: Bed was extremely comfy, views and the style of the hotel exceeded expectations

Name: Louis
Review_title: Defanlty worth the money and going to go again
Positive: The view, the staff the breakfast area everything tbh
Negative: The only thing wrong being that's its 10 min walk away from the station

Name: Salome
Positive: The room was furnished with a lot of style. The feature to switch the shower from clear translucent glass was super extra! Very clean, close to the tubestation. In general tasteful furnishing. Magnificent view over the city from the skybar. Checkin and checkout possible 24/7, quick and easy.
Negative:
All around the hotel were building-sites. Made it a bit hatd to find your way, the shortest way to your destination. The staff was helpful and described the best way to the tube.
When we wanted to visit the skybar the lady at the entrance didn't treat us welcoming. She didn't believe we were hotelguests and made us show our roomcard. Just the next day we found out we showed up after closing time. If she would have let us know from the beginning, we would have understood and would have come back another night. Comunication is key.

Name: Abby
Positive:
Stayed in this hotel before, and I love it.
The facilities eg: pool/sauna are lovely.
Hotel room is spacious with a lovely bathroom.
Bars and restaurant had out standing view.
Hotel staff upon arrival were lovely.
Negative:
Were told that we would have a room with a city view however on arrival we were told it would be at least an hour wait and so settled for a room with an average view.
There were problems with the lifts during our stay, ended up waiting over 15 mins to be taken to the top floor which was quite frustrating, however did not ruin our trip.

Name: Renato
Positive: Location and room were great
Negative: Had to wait quite some time past the check in time due to late check outs

Name: Hilary
Review_title: We had a great stay. Clean and quiet in a very nice and convenient area
Positive: Cleanliness quietness the view
Negative: We didn’t have our coffee replenished

Name: Michael
Positive: Everything the hotel itself the pool and how close everything was and as for the bedroom the view and all what it had already booked again staff helpful and the roof top for a beer was simply superb
Negative: Nothing everything was brilliant will be back again and again

Name: Andrew
Positive: The view from hotel room and restaurant was amazing

Name: Darren
Review_title: Fantastic hotel and even better service!
Positive:
The hotel is amazing from start to finish. The service at the reception was so helpful and even let me check in one hour earlier. I got a fantastic room overlooking all of london city, the decor in the room is amazing, modern clean and crisp. Room was kitted with all the essential toiletries etc. The rooftop terrace is amazing for a couple of vibey cocktails. 
All in all, it was excellent!

Name: Chris
Review_title: Great hotel with the best views
Positive: Location ok, great views from the hotel and brilliant restaurant and bar with outside viewing area.
Negative:
Pool very small. Staff on second day very poor and the breakfast had to wait 20 minutes to get a table. 
Also had offer for a pizza and a drink £16 and when phoned to get it they said that restaurant is closed and you can order same thing of room service menu but it was £26 or something like that. We ended up phoning Pizza Hut and getting a deliver for cheaper.

Name: David
Positive: Great room, helpfull staff, sky bar is great, good view of all main london attractions from our room, pool and sauna were decent. Would stay again!
Negative: Sky bar is a little pricey but expected for our stay on NYE

Name: Claire
Positive: This is a fabulous property... the amazing views and breakfast are incredible. Fabulous restaurant, bar & cocktail bar in the evening too. Stylish, breathtaking views of London’s skyline .. well designed rooms and the staff are wonderful!
Negative: Check in is often slow although it’s improved lately.

Name: Chris
Positive: We have stayed in the hotel before and picked again as we had an exceptional stay last time. Staff were brilliant and venue location (for what we needed) was ideal.

Name: Stathis
Positive:
-Room view
-Breakfast
-Location (near underground station)

Name: Rushane
Positive: Being at the hotel before I came back very impressed with my stay of recent
Negative: There wasn’t anything I didn’t like

Name: Charlotte
Positive: We were not told or aware of a fee that we had to pay in order to have our dog with us. We paid an additional £50 for this; had we known we wouldn’t of stayed here.

Name: Richard
Positive: Isabella who worked on reception was a massive credit to the company.
Negative: Bar staying open later 😂 Jokes! Loved everything

Name: Roxana
Positive: Everything was good, nice view from the room and food was excellent

Name: Hannah
Review_title: Overall, the hotel was comfortable, friendly, good value for money and exceeded my expectations.
Positive: The bed was really comfortable, staff were very friendly, room service was exceptionally good, the quality of food was brilliant.
Negative: Scrambled eggs were a bit rubbery, some areas of upstairs dining facilities are too close together.

Name: Anne-sophie
Review_title: Lovely stay for a weekend away
Positive: The interiors, the room was spacious and clean. Facilities were good. Breakfast was very good special thanks to Tatyana for putting a smile on your face every morning, even when its very early ! The rooftop bar amazing, a nice mixed crowd, and popular place to come in canary wharf, special thanks to Stefano , he is a great mixologist!

Name: Deborah
Positive:
Everything was perfect, we had requested a room with a good view as this was the whole purpose of booking this hotel, our request was fulfilled and exceeded our expectations.
We booked Bokan and also requested a table by the window as we were celebrating an anniversary, this was also fulfilled along with an anniversary desert compliments of the restaurant.
I can not recommend this hotel enough it was amazing.

Name: Lyia
Positive: Everything was amazing, staff were super helpful and room was beautiful! Smelt amazing. Worth the money.

Name: Temi
Positive: Everything!
Negative: The way the room service lady presented my juice, she brought it all the way to the 35th floor without covering it and without a tray. We ended up not drinking it, because we're not sure about it.

Name: Alexandra
Positive: Welcoming staff and a very clean and comfortable room - the chocolate left in our room as a birthday gift by the manager was also a lovely touch and very much appreciated!
Negative: The sink in our bathroom was a bit slow to drain, but really that was the only issue we had.

Name: Graham
Positive: Great views of London. Well located for tube and DLR, perfect location to stay for night out at the O2 arena.
Negative: Bit too much development going on around the hotel. Noise didn’t bother us at all just dirt on roads and dig up parhways

Name: Russell
Positive: Nice, new , clean, good gym
Negative:
Terrible bar service. Couldn’t order at bar as table service only which I didn’t want !!
Drinks took ages to come and then billed for a service/table fee that I never wanted in the first place and something that the staff/hotel didn’t deserve as poor service !!

Name: Roshell
Room_stayed: Superior Double Room with City View
Positive:
The lovely guy on the reception was great. When I walked in he knew it was my partners birthday and have us both a free drink on the amazing terrace. He also followed my request and gave us an amazing room on the 28th floor with a beautiful view of the skyline!
The room was super clean and room service was very efficient. 
I will definitely be back! Thank you Novotel 
The spa area was lovely and quiet and relaxing.
Negative: They should make the gym area abit bigger and they should improve TV, it’s not a smart tv (maybe add better channels and make it easier to connect your phone)

Name: Elemer
Positive:
Friendly staff, polite and professional. 
Room was super clean and comfortable.

Name: Patrick
Positive: Everything
Negative: What a lovely and modern hotel. The views are excellent from the roof top. The vast array of breakfast catered for everyones needs.The Friendly staff were accommodating.The pieasta resistance was a glass wall joining the bedroom and bathroom together. With a touch of a button, the glass wall became frosted. My partner was very happy..

Name: Annie
Room_stayed: Superior Double Room with City View
Review_title: amazing hotel, not so amazing staff
Positive: Our room was fantastic, the view, the shower, the bed!! Also loved the sauna and the fitness room. Best hotel I have ever stayed at!
Negative:
The staff. Some of them should really work on their english and friendliness.
Also no gluten or dairy free options in the restaurant, pizza place or the breakfast buffet

Name: Mohammed
Positive:
The facilities and the view from our room 3208, you could literally see the shard, London Bridge, literally the whole city
P.s the only issue we encountered was The tap in our room was clogged water was being drained extremely slowly by the sink. Other then that I have no issues

Name: Alexander411
Review_title: Amazing views and bar, rooms also very nice
Positive: Great hotel, rooms, staff and views are 10/10

Name: Amy
Positive: I didn't eat breakfast in the hotel, but the hotel has a wonderful roof top bar that was amazing. The location was fantastic, and very reasonably priced. Would thoroughly recommend.
Negative: I struggled to find the light to the bathroom. However I was a bit drunk on the lovely cocktails from the roof bar :-)

Name: Teigan
Review_title: Amazing place to stay when visiting Canary Wharf
Positive: Lovely room and view, great staff and service.
Negative: I would of preferred more sugar in the room but that’s just a preference.

Name: Adam
Positive: Great views across the whole of London

Name: Deepak
Positive: Food service to rooms were amazing. Facilities in rooms are great and the rooftop bar is also a great option for drinks.
Negative: Pool and Spa is only accessible between 7-10am which can be burden if you only stay one night

Name: Kevin
Positive: I was very impressed with the facilities, the breakfast was amazing and the rooftop bar was really good. But With such a good selection of gins why would there only be one choice of tonic?
Negative: Rude receptionist who processed £100 pre-auth to open a tab then didn’t process it on the system so I was placed in the embarrassing position of being declined at the rooftop bar and having to find another means of payment! Poor!

Name: Andrew
Positive: Incredible food, views, facilities - you’d never have to leave!
Negative:
There was an hour was it for room
Service at 2am.

Name: Marie
Positive: Great breakfast selection

Name: Daniel
Positive: The staff that we spoke to were so lovely. The hotel had a good amount of edge and we loved the style.

Name: Mhairi
Review_title: Stylish hotel a bit out of the way from the city, but great views and facilities.
Positive: Stylish room, great view, love the bar/restaurant, friendly staff.
Negative: Very expensive - £200 for one night. Had stayed earlier in the year and it wasn't that expensive, probably as it was a Saturday night.

Name: Nicholas
Positive: Location great, nice and quiet after a busy day in centre
Negative: Construction, but I’m clutching at straws there trying to find a negative. Definitely stop there again

Name: Léa
Positive: Lovely hotel, amazing views of London, close to the underground, easy to get around. Great choice of breakfast. Communication is brilliant and the organised a lovely little surprise for me in the room or macaroons and a card as I had graduated that weekend. Would definitely stay again. Spa is a great bonus too to relax!

Name: Grigorie
Positive:
The view and location were amazing. 
Very friendly staff. 
Clean and very comfy. 
We really appreciate the sweets gift for my honey moon cousins.
Negative: Waiting to be seated for the morning breakfast.

Name: Freya
Positive: Incredible hotel and views

Name: Sarah
Review_title: Great stay in London and at the Novotel would definitely stay again
Positive: Very clean room and bathroom. Bed and pillows very comfortable and a fabulous big tv. Tea and coffee in the room which was great. Breakfast was excellent with a fabulous panoramic view of London !!!

Name: Alexandra
Positive: So friendly - and loved the hospitality as it was my partner’s bday! Made it special!

Name: Lauren
Positive: Our room was spotless clean, it had everything we needed a lovely bathroom with a good sized shower, very comfy bed and amazing views of London

Name: Susanna
Positive: We loved the view from our room, and from the 38th floor. The room was gorgeous and the bed was very comfortable. The bathroom was exceptional and we loved the screen/glass between the bathroom and the rest of the room.
Negative: The water pressure in the shower was quite weak. This is our only point of improvement that we have for your hotel as everything else was amazing!

Name: Marwan
Positive: The bar and dining facility on tge 38th. Also staff was great there.
Negative:
Fact that my reservation via booking.com doesnt allow me points on my membership card...very strange: at the end, novotel is paid with my money!!
Price is still too high but i guess its london...

Name: Susan
Positive:
We had a great stay here for my husbands 40 th birthday . 
Reason for not giving a higher score .. there wasn’t much toiletries in the bathrooms . The swimming pool area had no loungers for relaxing when using the spa area . Also there was a problem with door entrance area to the pool we couldn’t access it . After 2 trips back up to reception and changing our cards it still didn’t work and alongside with a few other guests we got a passing member of staff to open the door but none of our cards would work . We had to block the door with a towel to prevent it from locking . 
Breakfast was excellent 
Views were amazing but the little things that lacked were frustrating we would have left a higher score .

Name: Jeremy
Review_title: Fantastic staff and hotel. I will return and would highly recommend
Positive: From the moment we arrived the service was first class. We were made to feel very welcome by Sara (must say her name as she really was superb). All the staff were. The hotel and room were clean and stylish. I will be returning and would highly recommend.
Negative: I have no complaints at all.

Name: Georgina
Positive: Clean / good location / great facilities
Negative: The hotel should invest in good hairdryers.

Name: Finn
Positive: The facilities were good and also the breakfast
Negative: Taxi’s around the area were difficult to get hold of.

Name: Siobhan
Positive: Swanky room, fabulous river side view in the room and at breakfast. Perfect location for exploring London, especially Greenwich as it’s not too far away. Lovely breakfast, plenty of choice. Blackout curtains and comfy beds, air con was quiet too.

Name: Nicola
Positive: The staff are the best feature of this hotel. They are so helpful - even after we had to complain about a few issues - they moved us room and it was made to feel like no problem
Negative: The first room we spent our first night In had a leak in the toilet and a blocked sink - which wasn’t nice to look at and the tv didn’t work - making it uncomfortable for my partner to sleep

Name: Cameron
Room_stayed: Superior Double Room with City View
Positive: We were given a complementary upgrade which made our trip for my partners birthday extra special.

Name: Zara
Positive:
The bathroom - the glass that was see through but you could make it not see through 
Also the view from our room was lovely of London

Name: Cezar
Positive: Room view and staff were excellent. Had our anniversary and we had a lovely card and chocolate from the staff. We loved our stay.

Name: Mahbubur
Review_title: It was my gf and I’s anniversary and Frances upgraded us which was so sweet. We had only asked for a
Positive: It was my gf and I’s anniversary and Frances upgraded us which was so sweet. We had only asked for a room with a nice view but everyone exceed our expectations and my partner had such an amazing time. We thank all the staff for making it a really special time.

Name: James
Review_title: A little expensive but you get what you pay for, once I've saved up I would consider staying again.
Positive: Breakfast was very busy and some of the buffet food was warm rather than hot but this wouldn't put me of from returning. The view of the city from the restaurant, bar and our room was spectacular and the use of the pool and solarium was a nice bonus.
Negative: The overall breakfast experience which was OK but not great. It didn't meet up to the otherwise excellent facilities and all round experience

Name: Jj
Positive: Position, rooftop bar and restaurant with amazing views, large room, helpful staff

Name: Pauline
Positive: looking out over the river was lovely from our room and at breakfast. Liked the opaque glass in bathroom that was cool!
Negative: couldnt find breakfast facilities easily as we werent sure it was the restaurant. So went to reception to check. No biggy!

Name: Rachel
Review_title: Nice hotel in a good location, very clean and a good breakfast. Take lots of money for the bar! :-)
Positive: The Staff were friendly and the breakfast was very good, lovely views from the roof top bar and restaurant areas, we only stayed 1 night so couldn't really comment on the facilities.
Negative: We were given a disabled room, which was fine as it was quite spacious etc, but my bed felt like it was lopsided I think it was probably due a new mattress? If I was staying for more than a night then I would have asked to change rooms, but everything else was good so couldn't really complain. The only other thing we found was that the drinks were very pricey compared to neighbouring hotels and restaurants.

Name: Emiliyan
Positive: Perfect hotel, perfect staff, perfect food, perfect view! Amazing!

Name: Philip
Positive: They said they will email me an invoice as I left but I have not received it

Name: Danny
Positive: Great roof top bar with live music. Amazing views and lovely room
Negative: Nothing not to like fantastic stay

Name: Neil
Review_title: Excellent service will definitely be using again, already planning to book for the 22nd November
Positive: Helpful staff, great room and service , very clean

Name: Lolwa
Positive: the hotel acceded my expectation as it was in a very good location as well as the friendliness of the staff made my stay very enjoyable.
Negative: the breakfast selection was very tasty however not very much options.

Name: Hernán
Positive: Same breakfast for the whole week :(

Name: Sandra
Positive: It was my partners birthday, balloons, a nice card and chocolate were present in our room upon arrival, which was very thoughtful. Staff were very nice and polite, breakfast was definitely worth it especially as we had a beautiful view. Would definitely come back again.

Name: Gal
Review_title: love it and will definitely go back again and again!
Positive:
Breakfast is lovely!
the view from the top roof and the room is so beautiful!
the restaurant of the hotel at night mmmm!!!!
Negative:
the bathroom for such hotel like this with the exclusive room i took could have been away better!
hotel stuff could have been less cheapskates and spoil more at the room with wine and the minibar

Name: Jordan
Positive:
Very clean and modern property, great views from our 30th floor executive double room, great price also. 
Will definitely be returning

Name: Wendy
Positive: Excellent breakfast
Negative: coffee and tea at breakfast undrinkable!

Name: Sarah
Positive: I stayed at Novotel Canary for my birthday had a wonderful experience. The staff were so lovely to me from the moment I arrived the hotel was clean and cozy had a great time.

Name: Alfred
Positive: Lovely rooms great views good breakfast

Name: Katie
Positive: Amazing, so happy with the room and service!!

Name: Robert
Positive: nice place
Negative: 78 pounds for 2 breakfasts is daylight robbery

Name: Julie
Positive: Amazing view, the room was fantastic and as it was our wedding anniversary, Sara upgraded our room. The staff were amazing & the view was outstanding. The breakfast was delicious.

Name: Darren
Review_title: My stay was amazing and the breakfast was amazing
Positive: The breakfast was amazing also the staff were great from top to bottom.
Negative: I’ll probably say the mattress. It was too hard for me and my partners backs. Also the shower door as it kept allowing water to escape and wet the rest of the bathroom.

Name: Kavalerov
Positive:
The location was fabulous, as well as the room itself. We also enjoyed the dinner and cocktails in the bar on the top floor a lot. 
I also just have to say that going to bed with a night view of City, Shard, Tower Bridge and the whole central London feels extremely special!

Name: Joe
Positive: We loved the view from the room. The room service was lovely, very friendly staff.
Negative: The water from the tap smelt a bit funny. We had to use bottled water.

Name: Liam
Positive: Staff, location, room, view everything about the hotel was excellent will definitely be returning

Name: Rebecca
Positive: Staff went above and beyond to make us feel welcome! excellent service, lovely breakfast!

Name: Owen
Positive: Very modern hotel with a fantastic view of London and some nice little features I’ve not seen at other hotels in this price range like the ability to unfrost the bathroom glass so you can see out across London while your taking a shower

Name: Rukhsar
Positive:
Loved the staff at CW Novotel. Very helpful and pleasant. They offered me and my husband free drinks on the house and Goddiva Chocolate sent to our room. 
This was our second trip to this hotel. I definitely recommend this branch. 
The views are breathtaking!!!!
Negative: Rooms can be a little bigger

Name: Rob
Positive: Great location in lovely area, great views at breakfast from the top floor of London.
Negative: Superior double room was a little small

Name: Katy
Positive: Absolutely gorgeous as soon as we walked in. The staff were more than friendly and helpful! Absolutely loved our stay and will definitely be back!

Name: Charley
Positive: Amazing stay upgraded us for my boyfriends birthday for free without me even asking, so welcoming and quirky I loved it and would highly recommend

Name: Yambiso
Positive: It’s modern, very comfortable bed and great views
Negative: The tv requires a hdmi cord which we asked for at reception but they never got back to us.

Name: Zane
Positive: This hotel was absolutely fantastic. The decor was modern and stylish. The staff were warm and friendly and couldn’t do enough for us. The receptionist Sara was amazing and made our trip that extra bit special! The hotel is in a good location about a 10 minute walk from the underground and easily accessible from Liverpool Street.
Negative: Not a lot of restaurant options around the hotel

Name: Airi
Positive:
The bed was super comfy and the view was brilliant. It was a gorgeous room and hotel. I couldn’t stop staring out the windows at the London skyline!
Also they have a 24 hour pizza room service, the price is extra reasonable and the pizza was delicious! Perfect!

Name: Jeno
Positive: everything

Name: Stacey
Review_title: Great staff and excellent breakfast views
Positive: Rooms spacious and very comfortable. Reception staff helpful and welcoming. The bar/restaurant is the best feature with a 360 view of London. Staff quickly found us a table near to the window on both visits.
Negative: Not the hotels fault, but there is building work going on right next door.

Name: Jayvon
Room_stayed: Superior Double Room with City View
Positive: they went out of their way to give us a good room and view just as well requested and also helped me plan my girlfriend’s surprise for her birthday
Negative: could we have more sugar in the room next time lol. Im joking i have no complains😂.

Name: Susan
Positive: The view

Name: Shanice
Positive: The Staff Members Were Very Kind & Professional

Name: Xander
Review_title: Nice trendy hotel in business area
Positive: Nice bar and nice rooms

Name: Kelvin
Review_title: One of the best for overall value.
Positive:
Spa area was awesome and it's great they have a boxing bag and speed bag in the gym, very rare for a hotel and they were good quality too. 
Room was one of the best we've been to, amazing view and we got a free upgrade which was awesome. 
The mini bar was complimentary which is a unique selling point, usually they put silly prices on everything you have in your room. 
Service was excellent and breakfast was really good. Restaurant and bar were great aswell, the view from the top is great. 
All in all a great experience , will defo be back. Keep it up!

Negative: The towels were very thin and the sheet didn’t fit our double bed. We weren’t given very much milk and only decaf coffee the first day. No robes in the wardrobes or slippers. That would be a nice touch.

Positive:
Very modern hotel. Rooms were spacious for London, very clean and comfortable. Lovely decor throughout. Staff were engaging and welcoming. Dining staff were efficient and assisting despite being very busy. The restaurant and bar on floor 38 give wonderful views of the Thames, Canary Wharf and major multi-level buildings of the metropolitan area. Breakfast was excellent. 
Pool, sauna and gym were good too.
Negative: One of the 4 lifts was out of order which slowed movement on Sunday when the top floor bar and restaurant was at its busiest but this was fixed by Tuesday. Lifts are modern, obviously, and rapid so shouldn’t be an issue generally.

Review_title: Breathtaking great value for money with beautiful views.

I took my husband here for our 13th wedding anniversary, when we entered our room we had a hand written postcard with a pic of old canary wharf and saying happy anniversary which I didn't ask for so thought this was very thoughtful, we also had a plate with these cute biscuits and happy 13th anniversary written on it in white chocolate which I thought was a nice touch. 
The reception staff were great, I had got in some distress re personal issues and was very upset, they helped calm me down so much especially this lovely lady I wish I had got her name.
I cant fault this hotel. It's fantastic, great value for money, and can't wait to go back again.

Name: Chelsea
Positive: Staff were incredibly helpful and friendly especially lady at the check in, she was amazing. Lovely variety of breakfast and facilities. Room was to a very high standard and room had an overwhelming view and wasn’t even top floor. Will be staying there again!

Name: Sam
Positive:
We loved the rooftop terrace and breakfast on the 38th floor! Also loved the way you could make the window from the bathroom transparent or opaque so you could choose to enjoy the amazing view or have some privacy! 
Staff couldn’t have been more helpful and we were upgraded. Would thoroughly recommend!!
Negative: Breakfast was rather expensive but was worth it for the view.

Name: Courtnie
Positive: The view. The room. The receptionist. Just everything

Name: Tom
Positive:
The hotel has the height and the hype that goes with the surroundings of Canary Wharf. From it’s contemporary, edgy feel of the interiors, to its grande magnitude in scale and its breathtaking views from the rooms, and rooftop. It really is a spectacular getaway. At night the city lighting up your room glistens beautifully. The bed was well equipped with a lovely mattress topper and feather soft pillows, we stayed on the 28th floor and my word I’d recommend upgrading to a deluxe double, for supreme views, comfort and 24hour room service. Everything about that room was curiosity. Many different buttons and gadgets in built to add subtle charming effects to your experience. Ingenious little things which overall gave such a massive impression on us.
Breakfast wise, continental breakfast was tastier than your authentic English, but the food tastes that much better when it’s taken in with the spectacular views of the 38th floor. The hotel was exceptionally clean throughout and the staff were lovely, helpful and friendly. The pool is a lot smaller than the photos suggest, but the creativity continue in the pool with buttons that allow you to pour down a mini waterfall feature into the pool, along with a rapids machine. The water was crystal clear and the facilities were fantastic but I would say that more than 6 people in the pool at once would be a crowd - I’d suggest to swim in the evening or the morning to avoid being on top of each other.
The 39th floor has a rooftop bar and some of the most incredible skylines I have ever seen in London. I like the location, being a 7min walk from the Canary Wharf tube station and a 30min tube to the centre of London is really nice. Means you can get the feeling of escaping and come home to relax.
I would say that I was expecting a bigger room however, and that you are ultimately paying for one of the best views in London rather than the best rooms in London.

Name: Bronagh
Review_title: Great stay. Would recommend this hotel.
Positive: Beds were extra comfy and complimentary orange juice was really nice.
Negative: Some building working going on in the area which meant having to walk done a dark lonely alley at night coming from the tube station which felt a bit dodgy but doesn't take away from the great experience in the hotel itself.

The bar in the hotel was great! Food was delicious and they had a singer who had a beautiful voice creating the perfect atmosphere. The roof top bar and the breckfast in the morning was amazing! Can’t fault this hotel one bit.

Name: Claire
Positive: Excellent location. Views from rooms facing the Thames were amazing. Rooftop terrace views were fantastic.
Negative: For a hotel of this size, the bar area is very small, particularly when much of it is reserved by diners. It appeared that a large seating area was cordoned off with no-one using it which seemed a waste particularly on a Saturday evening when the terrace was too cold to sit in due to the strong winds. We wanted to be able to have a drink as a family including two 17 year olds who were not allowed access in the evening due to their age (yet a tiny baby was permitted with its parents?). Our children therefore missed out on the opportunity to see the night views from the rooftop terrace. There is no mention of an age limit on the hotel website - they were clearly not looking to drink alcohol as are under age and were accompanied by us, their parents, so this seems unnecessary and is not typical for a hotel that is supposedly geared up for families.

The staff upon arrival etc were not welcoming at all and it took ages for me to be served at the bar upstairs despite it not being busy.

The lifts smell amazing!
Comfortable bed 
Massive TV

The pool area is lovely. I would give this hotel 10/10 if they had a jacuzzi or steam room!

The staff were excellent in particular Jerome who looked after us so well and was so professional. He didn’t overlook anything and made us feel like valued guests. He helped resolve a small
Confusion and was so respectful.
The beds are so comfy - the views incredible and the food absolutely wonderful.
We had the best time ever!
Negative: A small mix up by one of the female reception staff who told us we couldn’t have late check out and told us we had to vacate our room when we had been advised the night before that we could request it any time up to 12. And this made the end of our stay a little fraught but Jerome sorted this for us with such professionalism. And staying until 4pm made the World of difference to us.

Positive: Great location and close to the tube. Breakfast inclusion is great value for money. Staff are friendly and super helpful. Close to tesco and other restaurants so you don’t have to rely on the hotels restaurant alone. Canary wharf is a busy hub and has many gems! Late check in can be a bit tricky but midday check out was great! Gym facilities are good but pretty small so timing is important. Great to have access to sauna and pool at no extra cost.
Negative: We had to move room as the was something... brown... splattered on the wall and on the bed. Even though staff were great about it, it put a dampener on the experience for us!

Generally a lovely luxury hotel which I look forward to going again.

The hotels’ bar and restaurant is on the top 3 floors and has the most amazing views over the London skyline and Thames!
If you want to have an amazing experience in London and need a location near Canary Wharf you can’t go better!

Negative: Service at breakfast was a little chaotic (person who seated us never offered us a drink, went to ask second person who then took order but forgot to bring our tea & had to ask a third person), it wasn't a big issue but maybe they need a different system to help things run smoothly. Staff very friendly though.

Name: John
Review_title: 25 year wedding Anniversary should have stayed at the Marriott Canary Wharf!
Positive:
First impression as we booked in looked promising warm welcome and enthusiastic reception team had all the patter "We have a fantastic room for you brilliant view" room 3004. On opening the door we saw fantastic view of the city and then we saw the carpet covered in black stains! I called reception immediately as we where concerned we would be held responsible. Reception visited and offered another room but it would not have the view! I asked why the carpet had not been cleaned? He could not answer!
The room was comfortable 
Bokan bar & grill on 38 floor on Saturday night was buzzing live music bar open till 01:00 but be warned Sunday & Monday Bar closed 23:15!
Bar staff, waitressing, restaurant manager at breakfast, cleaning and reception brilliant, two negatives Chef on breakfast Monday rude and unhelpful refused to cook fresh egg and bacon most items on breakfast Buffy burnt, Security / doorman working in Bokan rude and barred the entry when returning from night out Sunday & Monday never asked if we were residents.
Spectacular View from bar and restaurant book a table in advance for Friday and Saturday night its heaving los of public customers.
Drinks on average at London prices good bar service friendly and entertaining.
Negative:
The carpet covered in black stains! I called reception immediately as we where concerned we would be held responsible. Reception visited and offered another room but it would not have the view! I asked why the carpet had not been cleaned? He could not answer!
Two negatives on staff Chef on breakfast Monday rude and unhelpful refused to cook fresh egg and bacon most items on breakfast Buffy burnt and Security / doorman working in Bokan rude and barred the entry when returning from night out Sunday & Monday never asked if we were residents.
The mini bar for beer, wine, soft drinks, water and snacks was free only problem was once you drunk the mini bar contents and eaten the snacks only minimal items were replaced, water 1 still bottle.

Name: Mr
Positive: The view from my room was truly amazing, we could see the London skyline clearly. Also the room was very modern from the shower to the Tv, everything is up to date.
Negative: We had to wait 40 minutes before we were taken to our room, and we were taken to the wrong room at first, before being given the correct room, which was quite inconvenient.

Negative: The bed was very uncomfortable. We had back pains in the morning and couldn’t sleep well.

fab location, 5 mins from tube ....
view from our room where AMAZING... views from the rooftop restaurant were even more spectacular.

Name: Colin
Review_title: Thoroughly enjoyed my experience at the Novotel.

Positive: The views of London were spectacular !

The pool 
Would be nice if it was higher up and you could swim overlooking London

Positive: Modern room

Name: Yiping
Positive: I was located on a high floor, the view is very nice. Hospitality is also good, will recommend to my friends.
Negative: A bit far from the canary wharf underground station

Name: Roy
Positive: Very good stay and I will come back again.

Positive: Just a great hotel. Rooms are spot on, pool is perfect, the roof terrace bar is amazing.

Name: Shaandeep
Room_stayed: Superior Double Room with City View
Positive: Service was excellent, staff went the extra mile to make sure we had everything we needed

Name: Nes_ja
Positive:
Very nice hotel in Canary Wharf, with the underground you are within 10 min max. in the city centre. You don't even have to change for most of the sights. From the hotel to the underground it is about 8 minutes by foot. The hotel is great, but not for people who are afraid of heights. Breakfast is on the 38 floor, which is great, one has a view over the whole city. The breakfast is also very good, sometimes you have to wait a moment until you get a table - but that didn't bother us. The staff is always helpful and very friendly. 
I'm sure we'll come back.

Name: Bryce
Positive: Everything was great, room was great nice views and nice people

Name: Siobhan
Review_title: Not as great as our last few stays unfortunately!
Positive: I regret having to write this review as I'm usually writing the most amazing reviews about Novotel Canary Wharf. However, our stay this time was quite disappointing to say the least. My partner (Joshim Uddin) booked an Executive Suite for my birthday as this is one of our favorite hotels. The night of our stay we went up to Bokan to get a drink as it was my birthday, I got told the bar shuts at midnight so we went up at 11PM to give us enough time to sit and have one drink. We got approached by a security guard lady (unsure of her name but can give description) She stated to us that the bar was closed, we advised we're staying at the hotel and just come up for one drink as we got told it closed at midnight. She then went over to speak to a lady who then allowed us to buy one drink. However, this whole time we felt very uncomfortable and un-welcomed by the staff / security standing around and staring so we went up to the rooftop, we then got approached by another girl who told us the bar is now closed, we stated we know and we already have our drink. However, she just stood a few feet away from us waiting for us to leave, so in the end we just took our drinks back to our room! This had ruined our night completely and we were and still are angry at how we got treated! We were very gutted as we were debating on staying an extra night with you guys but after the first night we just knew it wouldn't make us happy. The day of check out, we left our luggage at the hotel and came back to get them around 9PM, we decided to relax in the members lounge area for an hour before we headed home, once again I got approached by a security guard this time a male. He came over and said "are you a member?" I said "yes I'm a member of the accor hotels" he then replied "are you staying at the hotel tonight" I stated that we checked out that morning and we're getting our luggage, we were just relaxing before we head home.
Negative: Following on from the top paragraph box - In which he was very rude and commented back "so you aren't staying in the hotel tonight" I had already told him no! I was shocked and quite frankly embarrassed the way we were treated by two security guards and a few members of staff! Absolutely shocking!! We first came to this hotel when it was brand new and just opened, it was amazing but now it seems like you have employed the most arrogant security guards who do not care about the guests! In which case is very bad as this will stop a lot of your loyal guests from coming back! I am also extremely angry as when we got our suitcase back the handle had broken, this wasn't the case when we handed it in to be stored safely for the day? (I'm happy to send pictures) The only thing we could think of is if someone had forced the suitcase handle down causing it to break, not realizing you need to hold a button in for it to go down? I understand this is awkward however surely if you're looking after guests luggage the staff would be more careful and not force or break the luggage! This wasn't exactly a cheap suitcase so my partner and I are more than just a little angry in regards to this situation. I am very sad that I have had to write this sort of review as I was expecting to write a brilliant one as always. All in all the Executive Suite was very beautiful, well laid out and spotless. Our room was amazing which made our stay just that little bit better. I would like to thank the staff that sorted out our room, and also gave us the little treats and birthday card it was a lovely gesture. I just cannot put into anymore words how extremely disappointed and upset we are in regards to the issues caused.

Name: Corrina
Review_title: Excellent stay, will be back again!
Positive: My son and I stayed for his 9th birthday. We received a warm welcome at reception, a card in our room, complimentary popcorn, tea, coffee etc. Staff were friendly and helpful. Excellent view from the 19th floor. Pool was clean and warm. Wide selection at breakfast. Location was good, short walk to Canary Whaft.
Negative: My husband was joining us for breakfast but decided against it as an additional breakfast was at a cost of £25.00. Far too expensive. Anyone would struggle to consume £25.00 worth of breakfast.

Name: Lucy
Positive: It was lovely and clean! Very nice room with a lovely view! Perfect for going to an event at the O2 just around the corner! Lovely pool and sauna facilities

Name: Viorica
Positive: Wonderful view! Amazing bathroom and comfortable beds
Negative: the bathrobe is missing, the room was a bit small.

Name: Luka
Positive: The staff, especially the manager, is very understanding and ready to help resolve any kind of issue.

Name: Dean
Positive: Complimentary mini bar was not advertised as subject to additional charges and was limited in selection.

Name: Margaret
Review_title: Lovely relaxing time, wonderful Xmas lunch
Positive: I thought it was a great friendly place to stay. I was very happy with everything

Name: Laura
Positive: Great location. Friendly and helpful staff.

Name: Clare
Review_title: Great views, short walk to Canary Wharf tune station, loved Bokan bar on the top floor
Positive: Asked for a quiet room & a room with a view - both of which were provided with no extra fee. We had a lovely view of some of the main sites in London. Bokan bar is lovely with some tasty cocktails. Pool / sauna / gym area clean & quiet (we went around 3pm on a Saturday afternoon). Reception staff very friendly and nothing you ask seems too much. Thank you for a wonderful stay.

Name: Tim
Positive: Great location and view. Would use it again!

Name: Edgars
Positive: Great view！Good placement if you attend O2arena.

Name: Raees
Positive: I've stayed at the Novotel London Canary Wharf twice before and it's always a great stay. I love the feel of the hotel, the staff are always super friendly, smiling and helpful.

Name: Cynthia
Positive: Well organized , friendly staffs and quick responded.

Name: Lggeorge

Negative: Bar prices a bit high, but probably to be expected in central London.

Positive: The view was breathtaking, our room was perfect it made our anniversary and birthday so special, I would definitely book it again, not only because of the hotel but the staff were helpful and so kind, the pricing was amazing, it was really perfect.
Negative: There was nothing that we didn’t like we were very pleased with that what we received.

Name: Ricardo
Positive: The view from my room over London was amazing bed was super comfy and the room had lots of perks like the bose speaker, huge tv, stunning view!

Name: Antiopi
Positive: The location of the hotel is great as it is very closed to the tube. The facilities are amazing and the staff is very friendly and helpful. The room was very good and we had breakfast with a beautiful view.

Views, room, staff and breakfast were incredible. Staff were really helpful and the late check out time was much appreciated.
A lovely stay all in all.
Negative: Weren't given robes in our room which was a little disappointing. We asked for some and were told they weren't included in our room rate, i personally think they should be included in all room rates. Not much seating around the pool but pool, sauna and gym were lovely none the less.

Name: Calum
Review_title: Brilliant hotel with great views of London.
Positive: The views from both the room and the restaurant were exceptional. Great value for money with easy transport routes into central London!

Name: Kirsten
Review_title: Beautiful hotel with fantastic views of the city.
Positive: The bedroom is lovely and modern with floor to roof windows which had a fantastic view (request a high floor room). The room was cleaned each day and restocked with toiletries etc. The hotel itself is very modern and the staff were helpful with anything we asked as it was our first time visiting London. Perfect place to stay for a city break as close enough to city but far enough away from the main tourist areas which makes it a bit cheaper overall.
Negative: The hotel is slightly further away from subway station than we expected more like a 10-15 min walk and it did take around 10 mins to get into most of the main tourist attractions. The hotel is situated in a business area so may need to travel a wee bit to find busy restaurants and bars but that's part of the fun of being in a new city!

Name: Nikos
Positive: Very beautiful design with a modern and cozy feeling. Young personnel very kind and helpful.

Name: Patryk
Positive: Outstanding view and delicious breakfast - a lot to choose from.

Name: Cheryl-ann
Positive: Exceptional views from breakfast and a delicious selection of food available. Hotel is located close to the Canary Wharf station which made travelling convenient.
Negative: Be prepared to stand in a line before being seated for breakfast, restaurant was filled to capacity on all 3 mornings of my stay.

Name: Nicola
Positive: Amazing view from our room. Loved The pool and steam room and all of the staff were lovely and helpful. Would highly recommend this hotel for a memorable trip to London.

Name: Hsalawehmoo

Name: Danny
Positive: Staff amazing. Stayed on our wedding night. Made a real fuss of us. Thank you!

Name: Anne
Positive: Excellent new hotel. Friendly and helpfull staff. Stunning view from the top floors with bar and restaurant, and also a good view from our room, which was on 19th floor. Breakfast was very nice. The interior/decor at the hotel is a very trendy "habour style". Nearby underground (about 5 minutes walk) with a direct line to London Bridge station (change for Gatwick airport), Waterloo station (London Eye) and Bond Street station (Oxford Street). I would love to visit this hotel again, and I highly recommend it.
Negative: The bathroom has a clear or matte glass wall facing the windows and the bed, which doesn't seem practical, if you have to go to the toilet at night, as the light from the bathroom lights up the room.

Positive: The hotel is located in the nice quite business area, near the shopping mall and underground station. We prefer this location rather than overcrowded city centre (e.g. Oxford street). The rooms were bigger than expected, the hotel is new and modern. The view from the 17th floor was great. The staff at the reception was very friendly and helpful, including our request for a taxi to be ordered for 3.00 am at Christmas night. We would definitely recommend staying here.

Positive: The hotel was nice, lean and staff were friendly and helpful. The rooms are spacious and comfortable, the beds were great with a nice selection of pillows.
Negative: I ordered two balloons through the guest amenities brochure, these were quite expensive at £9 each and were unfortunately not attached to the ribbon properly resulting in one flying away as we left the hotel which was upsetting for my partner. It should be made sure that balloons are done properly, there is a hole in the tag of each of for the ribbon and this needs to be used.

Positive: The location was perfect, staff were friendly and the view was amazing. Overall really nice hotel and quirky
Negative: Somebody walking into the room at 8 in the morning, assuming it was the cleaners

Review_title: Style and comfort at reasonable price in London
Positive: Everything... it is my favourite hotel in London.

Name: Leah
Positive:
I loved the view from our hotel room. Looked beautiful on a night seeing the whole of London light up. The room interior was modern and lovely! We especially liked the bathroom window from the bed to the bathroom that you can switch to cloudy so you can have some privacy. The bed was comfortable and the room was spacious, not to mention the big TV flat screen we had! 
The service was lovely, we ordered some room service and it was served with a smile, very friendly and approachable staff. I will be booking here again for definite. It was my boyfriends birthday on arrival so they gave us 2 complimentary drinks at the roof top bar for free, and they had written him a card with some complimentary mince pies in the room.
The hotel was based round the corner from the tube station so it was great as you didn't have to walk far. Also there is a Tesco express near so everything is very local and handy.

Positive: The view was amazing! The room very clean and the best breakfast we had so far plus it was on the 38th floor so we could enjoy the view from the restaurant aswell! The staff was very helpfull and kind! Highly recommend

Positive: We were arranged to a corner room where we could see the view of canary wharf. The room's modern and comfy. Pretty enjoy the stay here. It's a pity not having time to try the restaurant on the highest floor.

Negative: Most staff were friendly except one who was asked to replenish the snacks and he seemed grumpy about it.

Positive: The location of this property was amazing, very easy to commute to and from central London as the DLR and London Underground were in close proximity. The room in which we stayed was unreal with beautiful views of London’s skyline.

Positive: Perfect place to stay for my boyfriends birthday, little things they do to make you feel special. Would come back in a heartbeat.

Name: Oliver
Review_title: Really enjoyed our stay would recommend it to anyone
Positive: The view was breathtaking
Negative: A long walk from the underground

Name: Charlotte
Positive: The hotel was lovely, very clean and modern. The views from breakfast were just stunning!! The room was nice and I loved the waterfall shower, we got new snacks and drinks replaced daily as well. We got room service as the bar was a little busy, but the food was amazing I got the corn fed chicken and I have to say it was the best meal I’ve ever had, I would come back just for that.
Negative: I didn’t like about the hotel was that even thought it says breakfast is till 11am if you come in at 10.15 they say they are cleaning everything up in 10 minutes you feel very rushed and it was a little bit annoying having them tidy things up around you and take things off your table when you were still eating. Also I know it is a la Carte but the restaurant menu wasn’t very varied it didn’t have much for people who only eat chicken or are vegetarian, so we had to leave and go up to the bar for food instead. They are only very minor dislikes as everything else about the hotel I loved.

Name: Julija
Positive: We got the room on a high floor, the view was amazing! Couldnt be better :) The bathroom is stylish and spacious. The room looks cosy and clean. The check in was quick and friendly, reception area is very chilled which makes you feel extra comfortable :) Breakfast was delicious! Great selection and, again, an awesome view to start your day with! Thank you!
Negative: It would be good to have slippers and bathrobes in the room. Housekeeping woke us up at 8.30 am to clean the room, so if you do not want to be disturbed, dont forget to put DND sign outside the door.

Beautiful hotel, the view from the restaurant on the 38th floor is insane and the food is 5*!!

Will definitely stay there again, got upgraded for my husband's Birthday and complementary mini bar.

I've always got a room with a view and often got upgraded to the executive floor. The roof top restaurant is fantastic with great food and stunning views of London. I will definitively stay at this hotel again if I have business in the Canary Wharf area.

Name: Sophie
Positive: Amazing view and the room was insane. Would highly recommend

Positive: Very clean, very high end, and excellent facilities, lovely hotel room with a beautiful view from our room especially if you go up to the top of the building at the viewing point you can see pretty much all of London. Me and my girlfriend enjoyed staying here very much, didn’t want to leave after it, 100% without a doubt recommend it to anyone.

Positive: Room and hotel were great but the breakfast didn’t meet the high standard of the rest of our stay. The bacon was hard and the sausages were dry. Staff were helpful on arrival and in the bar.

Serve us!!

Positive: I mentioned that it was our anniversary and we got a room upgrade, cookies and free drinks in the bar. The staff were attentive and couldn’t do enough for you.

Name: Ian
Positive: Great location for O2. Good views of London from Bokan. Canary Wharf isn't busy at the weekend which is good as no one wants the hussle when away.
Negative:
Paid for hotel in advance so I didn't like paying £400 (4 people x £50 x 2 nights) on arrival to cover any potential extras or damages we may cause. I thought it was just us but saw other customers faces drop when they got hit with the charge when checking in. Got told would get the money back in few days after checking out.
Discretionary service charges are automaticly added so not discretionary. Got hit with them when ordering drinks even thoug I was at the bar. Got hit when we ordered a pizza (from cafe on ground floor), no came to our table and served us, all four of us walked up to till put our orders on. Maybe it's London thing and us Northerners expect to see a bit more service before getting charged for the most basic of service.

Name: Xue
Positive:
Very good location with 10-minute walk to the Canary Wharf Underground Station and DLR.
Very comfortable room and nice sight view. 
I would recommend it to my friends.

Name: S
Positive: The breakfast is the best, it is a must to get when coming here. Rooms are very clean and views are perfect. Stayed here plenty of times and would again. Amazing service never let you down.
Negative: The volume on the TV is low on some channels as the max is 20 limit.

Name: George
Review_title: Do it for the views and comfort
Positive: Modern well appointed hotel. Great sized room and very comfortable bed. Fantastic views and highly recommend Bokhan the restaurant. Close to transport links for central London and nearby Canary Wharf is only 7/8 minutes walk away. Whether tourist or business travelers this ticks all the boxes
Negative: Can be pricey, staff a little aloof especially in the restaurant but there isn’t much not to like tbh

Lucky it was my best friend I shared with and didn’t mind her seeing me in the shower or on the loo, but if it had been a romantic weekend, not sure I’d want my other half seeing me on the loo, or even worse if I’d been sharing with a business colleague!!!!

Unable to stay for three nights because there was no rooms available even prior to booking. Had to stay two nights and one night in Greenwich.

Name: Richard
Positive: Cooked breakfast fresh & hot. Cooked perfectly.

Name: Jormoz
Review_title: Great stay at Novotel Canary Wharf

Negative: Leisure facilities look better on photos, but still good quality.

Name: Gemma
Positive: Restaurant and bar

Name: Dobrinka
Positive: Hotel is nice, breakfast is solid and staff is nice.
Negative: We booked a room with a view and at the end got room without it on the 4th floor. I guess that rooms with good view are on higher floors which aren't intended for guests from Balkan even though we paid full price. This kind of guest discrimination is a poor practice :(

Name: Isabelle
Room_stayed: Superior Double Room with City View
Review_title: Fabulous hotel worth the extra tube ride for the quality/cost.
Positive: The view of London skyline from the breakfast room / bar on 38th floor is fabulous, the hotel design is gorgeous. Very good breakfast. One tube station ride from the O2.
Negative: They seem to be short of towels and bathrobes. AC does not leave the auto mode. Had to turn it off. Not much space to hang anything in the bathroom, pillows not comfortable. The rain shower was dripping cold water when using the other shower head. The area is not the best for pubs and restaurants.

Name: Sam
Positive:
The hotel was brilliant, the staff freindly and food was of a high standard. The Gym was good enough but very small so can easily become full.
If you do stay ensure you use the Canary Wharf station on the jubilee line and not Canary Wharf on the DLR, its half the time and half the hassle

Name: Hayley
Positive: Everything! It was amazing staff were so friendly and welcoming and the room was fab view was stunning!

Name: George
Positive: Good sized rooms, great view. Really nice breakfast

Name: Adrienne
Positive: Lovely hotel and location, room modern clean and comfortable and with usual extras. Was in room 401 and had asked for quiet room, this was available for me. Met son and his girlfriend for drinks in the bar and view was amazing, plus live music. Breakfast in same place next morning which to my delight included “chia/pumpkin and sunflower seeds” The hotel also had pool and small gym, very nice. All staff were approachable and very helpful...Well done Novotel London Canary Wharf!
Negative: I cannot think of. Anything negative

Name: Oneisha
Positive: Best hotel I’ve ever stayed in, from London to America to Italy, this has definitely set extremely high standards.

Name: Nickupton
Review_title: Excellent location, food and staff made for an extra special stay!

Name: Donna
Positive: Breakfast should be warmer

After uploading photos of Instagram and I got loads of messages asking me to what hotel we stayed in. It was amazing we are already planning our next trip!
Negative: The only criticism we had was that there was no bath robes or slippers in the room.

Name: Vinita
Positive: I really enjoyed my stay. The too view was great! I will be back again!

Positive: Best hotel experience so far. Hotel staff was exellent and offered us more than we asked for. Cause visited the hotel in Canary Wharf on special occasion, they provided us a nice welcome treat and room on a higher level!

Negative: Wish we were given a higher floor, the TV didn’t connect to an iPhone only android and the volume only went to 20 so we struggled to watch a movie off our phone

Name: Marilyn
Positive: Excellent view at breakfast.....good spread of food for 4 of 5 days I stayed (unfortunately salmon removed offmenu on Saturday)
Negative: All lifts not functional always.... restaurant on 38thfloor gets busy in the evening so difficult for in house guests to get a table with a view.....

Positive: I went here for my birthday and absolutely loved it here.

Name: Kevin

Positive: The room was spacious and had a lovely view over Canary Wharf.
Negative: The breakfast was terrible. The pancakes were like rubber and the bacon was really greasy

Name: Barrie
Positive: The room was excellent and location was excellent for what we were doung

Name: Nina
Review_title: Amazing location, beautiful facilities and stand out staff.
Positive: Amazing facilities and the view from our room was insane! The staff were all absolutely amazing, so friendly and so helpful. The room was also extremely clean and comfortable with a huge tv!
Negative: The breakfast was the only thing that didn’t meet our expectations, could have had more of a variety and higher quality - best to just head out somewhere.

Name: Stephen
Positive: We stayed for 2 nights, breakfast on Saturday was served in main restaurant and was excellent, on Sunday it was served in bar area and was extremely poor, all hot food was over cooked and unappetising, we told reception on check out but received no recompense. This spoilt the end of a great weekend stay.

Name: Katie
Positive: I booked this hotel for my boyfriends 25th birthday. It was the best hotel I’ve stayed in London. They went above and beyond by writing a birthday card to my boyfriend and giving us the best view of all the London attractions including the shard, tower bridge etc. No faults at all. The roof top bar is also amazing. Thank you for making mine and my boyfriends stay one to remember we will defintley be back.

Name: Ralf
Review_title: Nice new Hotel, Will be back

Negative: Breakfast 25 pounds...too expensice with lovely Carluccio`s serving perfect high quality breakfast at a 5 minutes walk and close to all Banks

Roof terrace
Bar
Bed

Negative: There was only one coffee machine in the breakfast area by the bar which could have been maintained better , water leaking onto the area surrounding it and on the floor. Perhaps a further machine would have been an idea

Name: Jacqui

Name: Andrew
Review_title: Excellent stay with good food and a location/view with wow factor
Positive: The room had instant wow factor as it we were allocated a room on 22nd floor, the view was Amazing. A modern contemporary room with a large tv and excellent bathroom. Excellent location for the O2 and Canary Wharf.
Negative: Customer service was standard, In line with expectations but in my opinion not in line with the excellent hotel.

We had dinner and it was a stunning meal. Nothing was too much trouble, the restaurant staff were fabulous and very attentive. I could not fault a single thing.

I was facing a building site. I could’ve paid much less and got a room on a lower floor with a better view. The whole point of booking that room is for the view. Was told when I was there that they had no more rooms between those floors with any other view than of an unfinished building. Was gutted to say the least

Name: Maryann
Positive: Had the best weekend. Hotel was lovely and the view from our room was amazing!!! London eye the shard london bridge wow!!!! Couldnt of got a better room with a view! Will defo be booking again next time.

Not a problem obviously, made us laugh.
