Name: Bryony
Review_title: Great location and excellent views on offer for that little something special
Positive:
The room was light and fresh, with amazing views, making the stay really special. We told the hotel that it was my partner's birthday and they left a card, a little snack and some items themed around one of his interests, which was great. 
Nice, modern facilities in-room, lots of tech and gadgets. 
Staff on reception were extremely welcoming and did what they could to make the stay really enjoyable. 
Really comfortable bed and pillows.
Negative:
I did want to reserve a few other additional services for my partner's birthday but unfortunately had to fill out a paper form with all my details and scan - not very safe so I declined. Also was told there was no need to book a table in the bar, but there were lots of tables reserved and we weren't able to get one. 
The price of the breakfasts, and particularly room service is extortionate! 
There is no parking at the hotel. If you stay at the weekend, you can risk it on the street where it is free or pay for use of a nearby carpark. 
Check in isn't until 3pm, which is extremely late in the day. 
Iron ruined my partners shirt- use with caution. Shower and plumbing seemed a bit backed up too.

Name: Rachel
Positive: Staff went above and beyond for my husbands birthday!
Negative: Service slightly slow with breakfast as there was no menu in our room

Name: Naomi
Positive: Amazing ! The staff were so incredible in making my boyfriend’s birthday amazing! They even wrote him a birthday card, the view from our room was nice and the view at breakfast was even nicer! Our room was spacious, the bed was really comfortable! I loved every minute they even gave us a complimentary drink and even helped store the birthday cake I got for him. 10/10 honestly !!! Wished I stayed longer. Definitely coming back

Positive: There was no phone in my room

Review_title: Great hotel if you want to be close to the center, but not directly in it.
Positive: Friendly staff, clean, quiet & comfortable room. The hotel is close to Canary Wharf station and pier, making it easy to get into the center. It is also close to LCY airport. The view from the restaurant and the bar is amazing! The breakfast buffet is large and in general of good quality. I will definitively consider this hotel again for my next visit in London!
Negative: The aircon outlet was directly above the bed and the air stream was unpleasant even at the lowest setting. The prices at the bar are rather high. We only found out on our last day that you can order extras at the breakfast for free (special coffees, eggs, porridge, etc.). But both points mentioned here are cherry picking.

Name: Beau
Positive: The tv

Positive: Everything was perfect-lovely, comfortable room with a wonderful view. Great night time bar and a fabulous breakfast to top it all off!

Positive: A hotel that exceeeds all expectations - amazing views , breakfast and extremely helpful /friendly staff. Rooms were clean and beds very comfortable. Would highly recommend this hotel to anyone considering it - don't hesitate and book it !

Positive: Comfy bed and spacious room. Fantastic views from the room top bar.

Name: Graphility
Review_title: A trendy place to stay and enjoy London!
Positive: A great, trendy place to stay and enjoy London. The property is well located and offers amazing views from the top restaurant floors. By the way, the Bokan restaurant was a great experience in itself, and I would book a table again with confidence! The room and bed were comfy and felt as if soundproof.
Negative: The breakfast, however, was complete but a tad expensive. The wellness and gym facilities were very nice, but the staff could be more attentive to the amount of towels or soaps available.

Name: Nichole
Positive: Very modern hotel
Negative: Booked for a double bed and was given two single beds to push together instead

Name: Bronwyn
Positive: The bed was very comfy, the rooftop bar was really nice

Name: Helen
Review_title: A wonderful hotel. We will definitely stay again
Positive: We loved the modern room, comfortable beds, lovely breakfast.

Name: Sophie
Positive: Our stay was amazing! The room exceeded our expectations and the view was incredible from the 21st floor!

Name: Shamim
Positive: I loved the hotel appearance, brand spanking new, modern with a little retro edge & soooo much class, clean & more than enough facilities.
Negative:
The staff, especially the supervisor “INES” I’ve never ever received such bad service from anyone in my life like I did with this lady. She was very abrupt, dismissive & had a lot of attitude which you wouldn’t expect from a supervisor. Whereas “Verno or Verca” not sure what his name was sooo understanding, welcoming & polite. He really was ready to help & assist.
The story behind my feedback is, it was my birthday, so in advance I contacted hotel directly over the phone & asked if it will be possible to get an early check in. Now normally people are asking for upgrades, beautiful view etc. However for myself, it was different. The man over the phone said that it will be fine & that I should come at 1pm instead of 3pm.
But he did mention to call that same morning to confirm it was still okay.
Now I did exactly that, I called 10am on the day & he was same person I spoke to prior who now confirmed it was still okay to come at 1pm.
Now I got there at 2pm & I’m was now being told that it’s not possible. And that they’ll work on something. Which I was fine with, however what I was disappointed with, was the fact that the booking doesn’t state that I need to make a deposit on top of payment of my room upon arrival.
Anyway, I was willing to pay but I explained to both Ines & gentleman that that it’s not in booking & they agreed booking.com don’t say it but it’s their rule and I made them aware of how misleading it was & they agreed.
Anyway, moving forward I ask to pay by cash for deposit even though I managed to pay with my card for room but that was due to sufficient on the card. “Verna or Verco” can’t remember his name, said that was fine he went to get document I needed to sign then all I hear is Ines shouting walking out saying “no no no noooo!! We don’t take cash & Verna/Verco asking why? It’s fine. She paid with card for room, we can take cash. And Ines shouting no, cash! Card only!

Name: Helen
Positive: Staff at the check in asked us if our visit was a special occasion and when we said it was our wedding anniversary we were given a room upgrade and complimentary drinks for the bar which made our special weekend really special. The room had stunning views of central London, was very comfortable and the bed was enormous! Breakfast was in a great setting at the top of the building - very tasty and again, amazing views. We didn't want to leave the hotel! Thanks to all the stuff for making our anniversary weekend very memorable.
Negative: The lack of instructions for screening the shower and toilet - not something within our experience! We got there half way through the stay and just found it very funny!

Name: Eloise
Positive: For such a cheap price we were treated so well by the reception staff. Breakfast was included and was delicious and the staff made an effort to give us the best view of London whenever they could (room and breakfast table). The roof top bar is amazing and drinks were very reasonable. The staff went the extra mile the whole stay and when we asked to check in early, they told us that they were happy for us to do so but recommended us to wait for the room they had selected and this was well worth the wait. The views of Canary Wharf, London eye, the shard etc were amazing. We will definitely be returning. (Also great location as we did some shopping and had lunch whilst we waited to check in and about a 4 min walk from the tube station and many restaurants).

Name: Banton
Positive: Very clean, beautiful views
Negative: Room service, Food menu could be better with more choice

Name: Francesco
Positive:
*the views
*the staff are amazing!!!
*the style of decor 
*the rooms are so chic
A massive thank you to Federica and Anna!!! They are amazing and you should be very lucky to have staff as kind, helpful and welcoming as those two! Thank you for making my stay a memorable one... We will be back!!!

Positive: very clean and comfy

Review_title: All nice comfortable and convenient for London but wouldn't eat there except the breakfast.
Positive: The view and comfortable bed with tea making facilities were great. Convenient for participating in the Great River Race just down the road.
Negative: Food menu was too expensive and fussy for our liking and not enough choice so went elsewhere.

Negative: Gurgling sink in en-suite. First morning breakfast we had to find someone to ask for coffee - given that everything else was self service we expected prompt attention for drinks. Pool area was good but pool was not warm enough on 2nd night.

Negative: Being two middle aged sisters we found the see through shower a little embarrassing even with a button to dim the glass a little. Although we did giggle like school kids.

Positive: The view from their restaurant Bokan and rooftop terrance is what this hotel is all about. Prob the best view of London I've ever seen. We also had an amazing view in our corner room. The pool/sauna was also really nice and relaxing. As it was our anniversary they gave us drink vouchers which we enjoyed as the sun was setting absolutely lovely.
Negative: When we arrived there were no towels and an empty box of tissues but was rectified quickly although they forgot the new box of tissues. Also during breakfast the service was not great as we had to chase 2 people down for our coffee/teas and milk.

Name: Fin
Positive: Very modern and unique.

Name: Sade
Positive: Amazing views lovely modern hotel huge tv screen!
Negative: Stains on bed sheets were a bit off putting but apart from that everything was great

Name: Daniel
Review_title: Perfect hotel in a perfect location.
Positive: Lovely place in Canary Wharf, sadly surrounded by construction sites. Hotel was nice, room was lovely and spacious, I loved the shower and bathroom had come with all the essentials - toothpaste, toothbrush, shower gel, shampoo, comb, shower cap..ect -room had some lovely views even with the two construction sites nearby, I could easily see The O2 and more. It's super close to South Quays DLR and a few minutes walk to the Canary Wharf tube, also nearby is a bus stop. There's two Tesco Express nearby, one is near the DLR station and one is on the road to the left side. There's a rooftop bar, sadly I forgot to visit.
Negative: Probably more information on things like the lift, you have to tap your room key before pressing a button. I didn't know, ended up on another floor where another member of staff told me. I saw quite a few guests doing the same so I think when checking in it should be explained.

Name: Michele
Positive: This hotel is great, I loved the decor it is very cool and the views from the bar/roof top are fantastic as was the view from our room. The staff were friendly and helpful. We stayed for my boyfriends 30th Birthday and it was perfect with some nice little touches from the hotel to make it extra special. The location is brilliant, very close to the bars, shops and restaurants of Canary Wharf and a quick hop on the tube to the many London sites or the O2. The DLR is also moments away. Would recommend this hotel and hope to stay again sometime.
Negative: This hotel doesn’t have parking but if you are using public transport to get into the city this isn’t a problem as the tube and DLR are so close

Review_title: Could have been a whole lot better if the staff paid attention to detail
Positive: The views from the room and the complimentary drinks
Negative: That my preference was overlooked and my request was not considered and no one prepared to make amends for the errors. Also they were not prepared to accept a deposit in cash

Name: Kayleigh
Positive: The bed was very comfortable; staff were friendly; breakfast was delicious.

Name: Keeley
Positive: All great - really friendly staff and lovely room.

Name: Leanne
Positive: Amazing hotel quirky decor friendly staff would definitely stay again

Name: David
Positive: I stay in hotels a lot. The important things are quick friendly checkin, a clean modern and quiet room and good facilities. 10/10 on all fronts for this place, excellent. The views are pretty cool too.
Negative: It can be a bit pricey to stay here, but when you get a good rate it’s wirth it.

Name: Vascoirun
Review_title: Perfect if you go by London City Airport
Positive: Nice place. Extra 38th floor with bar and terrace, beautiful by night

Name: Sinead
Positive: Amazing hotel - staff are so friendly, gorgeous interior, rooftop views are amazing in addition to having amazing views at breakfast! The breakfast was so good! Very impressed - I’m just wish I booked to stay another night it was so nice!

Name: Dawn
Review_title: Lovely location, spectacular views, great stay.
Positive: Really friendly staff, great facilities and made use of the pool and saunarium but what was most special were the views from the top floors. Just wonderful.

Name: Emmy
Positive: Great clean property with ethical products for those who are staying the views are beautiful and the breakfast is incredible!

Name: David
Positive: Good range at breakfast. Great views. Nice modern feel
Negative: The breakfast was too expensive at £25 each. It would have been better if the bar had been open till a little later at night

Name: Aamr94
Positive: Staff really friendly, price is reasonable and had a nice upgraded room. Room service is quick, place is clean and well looked after, finished to a very high standard.

Name: Anita
Positive: Room with a fantastic view of London. Bed was very comfy. Beautiful shower room

Name: Carinatruman
Review_title: Amazing, want an excuse for the next stay!
Positive: The hotel was amazing start to finish. The room was gorgeous with an amazing view. The bed was very comfy, food was delicious and loved the pool

Name: Mohammad
Positive: Room, location and facilities
Negative: Sink was blocked, their was no remote for the tv in my room

Name: Gary
Review_title: Try to book up again next month . But price was far to dear . Happy to pay same rate as this stay.
Positive: The bed was very comfy , Views were amazing .Lovely nice big telly in the room.
Negative:
Had a small problem when leaving our suit case at reception for 45 Minutes while the room was being prepared .When retrieving suitcase took a long time to find it. Got a tab worried .
But was found in the end .

Name: Annika297
Positive: Great location - close to shops and the tube. Staff were amazing, very helpful. They gym was very clean and had everything you needed.

Name: M
Positive: Staff are friendly and helpful and the hotel is immaculate. Breakfast food was lovely and freshly made with a good selection. The location is nice and the views of London from the rooms were delightful.
Negative: The screen between the bath/shower and the bedroom leaked water if anyone was taking a shower. The problem was reported the staff but maintenance had failed to rectify things over the days until we had checked out. That's not exactly what one would expect in a four-star hotel in London zone 2.

Name: Joanne
Positive: Quirky and superbly clean 😃
Negative: Longer walk from tube than was expecting

Name: Stacey
Positive: The staff were very thoughtful and couldn't do enough for you. I would pick this hotel time and time again when returning to London. The swimming pool facilities are stunning and the rooftop bar gives you amazing views over London.

Name: Tracy
Positive: Was pouring with rain when I arrived and I was saturated, staff at check in allowed me up to my room early so I could dry and freshen myself up - was extremely grateful.

Name: Tubadave
Positive:
Friendly staff. Extraordinary view. Clean. Spacious. Fantastic rooftop bar.
Would 100% stay again.

Name: Ewa
Positive: Great little pool, sauna and gym. Beautiful panoramic restaurant with views over London.
Negative:
The restaurant is open to the public on weekends and guests have to share it and the elevators with shady or drunk people. 
Average breakfast (although in a beautiful setting) with rude staff.

Name: Joanne
Positive: Bed was very comfortable. Fab view
Negative: Room and bit small for price charged

Name: Abbie
Positive: Amazing hotel with amazing views! We had a superior double bedroom and it exceeded our expectations!

Name: Joanne
Positive:
Hotel was clean and modern. 
Food was beautiful. Breakfast very nice. Most of the staff very helpful and friendly.
Negative:
Some staff very abrupt and not in any kind of uniform. 
Seats reserved but no one using them.

Name: Daniel
Positive: Rooftop bar awesome, good sized room

Name: Timothy
Positive: Goodrooms

Name: Ogechi
Review_title: Excellent stay. Can't wait to come again
Positive: Thank you for the lovely room amd treats as we spent the night to celebrate our 5th wedding anniversary and. We got free drinks vouchers. The room was clean and had the most beautiful view. Bokan resturant and bar was excellent.. food freshly cooked. Sauna and pool were great. Cant fault it. Hope to come back again soon.
Negative: Perhaps robes in room to go to sauna

Name: Lynne
Room_stayed: Superior Double Room with City View
Positive: Modern, clean rooms with lovely touchs, such as the fab rain shower and wonderful views. The bar and roof terrace provided stunning views across London.

Name: Kennethhussey
Positive: the views of the Thames and the City. Close to a good supermarket. Walking distance to trains both upper and Tube. Helpful staff, Great Breakfast. I will go again.
Negative: They serve pancakes with honey...where's the butter and maple syrup??

Name: Stacey
Positive: How swanky it was for the price x
Negative: The breakfast was so expensive so i took my own bowl and cereal and milk as i cant afford to spend £20 odd on a breaky x when j know i would only have a bowl of weetabix lol

Name: Shaun
Positive: Everything. 3rd hotel we stayed at in england and the only one to have an air conditioner. Staff were extremely nice and helpful. The Kiwi bloke at the front desk made me feel i was coming home every time we saw him

Name: Sean
Positive: Helpful staff, quick check-in/check-out.
Negative: Couldn’t find additional bottles of water for the room.

Name: Freewifi
Positive: It was all very good. Modern well specified rooms. Good quiet room with quiet air con. Restaurant very good with a fantastic view. Quick check in and out. 10min walk from south quay DLR.

Name: Angelica
Positive:
The view from my room was amazing. If you stay at this hotel you must use the pool and check out the terrace.
Breakfast was brilliant and once again, the view took my breath away

Name: Ellen
Positive: Nice room
Negative: A bit far away from centre

Name: Grant
Positive: We had an amazing the stay for our anniversary, amazing views.

Name: Michelle
Positive:
All in all was a lovely hotel amazing facilities 
A good selection of breakfast lovely staff will be booking again in the future
Negative:
Check in time was not on time at all kept being told different times 
And after being up very early for traveling it was not very nice when the room was not ready in time

Name: Edward
Review_title: Wonderful hotel! Go stay there it’s worth it!
Positive:
What a Wonderful hotel! Was in the suite for the Saturday night and I couldn’t ask for anything better.
Wonderful staff, lovely clean hotel, has everything you could require in a hotel room! 
I didn’t want to get out of the shower it was perfect
Negative:
Only really fault I could have is no parking but hey ho it is London.
And the lifts, they were very slow and would end up waiting a long time for a lift eventually get to you. But who’s in a rush.

Name: Phil
Review_title: perfect location for great London views
Positive: The roof top bar and restaurant were perfect and a great bonus for our stay with fantastic views over London.
Negative: Breakfast was just busy and mostly warm to cold.

Name: Iwona
Positive: Breakfast on 38th floor is just amazing....amazing food, amazing view... just perfect

Name: Sam
Positive: there is no dressing table mirror which makes applying make up and dressing hair awkward

Name: Jamie
Positive: Very clean modern hotel, 2nd time we have stayed and we love it
Negative: The lifts are a bit of a pain but nothing serious, that is just being very picky

Name: Maxine
Positive: Everything

Name: Erin
Positive: The view was incredible, loved the button to make the glass frosted in the bathroom plus we were given a free drink each on the rooftop bar! The executive room was worth the extra money, and food from room service delicious.
Negative: The pool was lovely but a little small, and got very busy in the time we were there. I also would have liked some info in the room about facilities, although these were mentioned to us at check in so not a big deal.

Name: Keelan
Room_stayed: Superior Double Room with City View
Positive: Not one fault In this place, amazing!

Name: Steven
Positive: Prefect view and stay, very clean and great service from all the staff.

Name: Cris
Room_stayed: Superior Double Room with City View
Positive: Pool, room and breakfast all good.
Negative: Lifts are slow and don't all go to every floor. Also have to use your key to enter floor number.

Name: Nikki
Positive: Location is excellent and the hotel decor is beautifully quirky. We will most definitely be back!

Name: Richard
Positive: Brilliant views from the room .
Negative: Went to the bar for a quiet drink with my wife and it was like walking into a club .

Name: Olga
Review_title: An unforgettable birthday experience for my husband.
Positive: The views were incredible.
Negative: The bar and terrace got very busy and had to wait some time in order to use the bar on the terrace.

Name: K
Review_title: Lovely stay for a quick getaway break
Positive: Cleanliness of the room , good facilities overall welcoming staff. Bedding was lovely clean room was cosy had good electronic features very reversed . Fantastic toiletries and amenities
Negative: The soundproofing in the rooms aren’t that great I could hear other guests above my head through the ceiling walking and conversing. It also seemed the celling structure was weak as I could also hear the impact of their footsteps which would lead you to believe the felling could collapse at anytime. I don’t believe I was refunded my deposit of fifty pounds either .

Name: Lina
Positive: It wasn’t as great as I thought it would be. For the price I think the room could’ve been a bit better. It seemed a little dated but maybe that’s just my opinion. I’ve stayed in better looking rooms for way less of a price. The staff were wonderful, very kind and helpful but the rooms are not really worth it, well at least the room I stayed in.

Name: Max
Room_stayed: Superior Double Room with City View
Positive: Room space, storage, helpful staff, use of the pool, bathroom nice and clean, lovely shower, beautiful views.
Negative:
The bed was exceptionally uncomfortable, as was the chair in the room.
On the whole staff were really helpful but a couple of things let it down such as we asked for cutlery to the room and it never arrived, another rooms dirty room service tray out side our room all afternoon and there was confusion about whether we were allowed to use the roof terrace or not (one staff member said no due to Covid measures and another a few minutes later said it was OK)

Name: Anthony
Room_stayed: Superior Double Room with City View
Positive: The staff thoughout our stay were flawless and professional
Negative: Room advertised as a city view ,but youcould only see it if you stood up and look round window .I had requested a nice view as it was a surprise for my partner. We also had brunch which was tasteless

Name: Ukladydaze
Positive: Nice views and friendly staff - decent rooms
Negative: Cold beans at breakfast and cold mushrooms and no fried eggs. Had spent a lovely morning in the pool and was looking forward to breakfast but the chefs were not keeping notice....

Name: Sharareh
Positive:
Room was not clean- carpet loads of stain and even not hoovered when we checked in! 
Bathroom door hing was broken.
Gym equipments 50% out of order. 
Totally, for 5 start hotel and amount of money which been paid, was disappointed.

Name: Ben
Positive: There was a creaking noise in my room the whole night.We was given a discount for this but this is totally unacceptable and should be in the print when you rent the room saying that if it is windy you won’t get no sleep because of this noise. I went here planning on have a lovely romantic stay with my partner but probably could of stayed indoors with my two kids and had a better nights sleep.

Name: Marian
Positive: Location was very good for access to Canary Wharf and public transport
Negative: The room - very basic and small, the beds (twin) were small and we were charged £90 for the privilege of moving from a double to a twin.

Name: Faridah
Positive: The bed was comfortable, but the staff are very rude

Name: Hemisha
Positive: The view from the room is incredible and the room itself is spacious. They have good standard of breakfast too.
Negative: There was a boiler issue which meant there was no hot water one morning which wasnt great. The bathroom door was quite hard to open too.

Name: Brandon
Positive: The view was amazing and the room was nice despite not being 100percent clean
Negative: It was my partner's birthday celebration and I agreed with someone to get a package booked. This was not arranged on arrival and ruined the day. Staff done nothing to arrange a solution

Name: Michael
Positive: Nice hotel

Name: Kareem
Positive: breakfast view
Negative:
no view from the room,
no bath tub in the room

Name: Chandraprakash
Positive: Location, Bar , food
Negative: Staff can be more friendly and engaged

Name: Mark
Positive: Rooms
Negative: Check in was awkward in view of the fact they demanded ID for our 16 year old. As UK citizens we don't normally carry this so this came as a surprise. It would have been good to been informed of this.

Name: Yuushac
Room_stayed: Superior Double Room with City View
Positive: The view from hotel
Negative: Bed was very uncomfortable, and the smell made me check out early.

Name: Ian
Positive: Views from room and restaurant/bar at breakfast are incredible. Beds are extremely comfortable and hotel is very clean. Bathroom facilities are excellent.
Negative: Breakfast wasn't of the standard I expected, and service was a little lack lustre.

Name: Mark
Positive: the last time we stayed was thoroughly enjoyable and the hotel has good views of London as it did this time but the problems at check in ruined this trip
Negative: i was extremely disappointed as i booked and paid the room for my son and his girlfriend as a Christmas present when they arrived the staff asked for the card the payment was made on and requested a photo of it so i sent a photo of the card but they then said this was no good the card had to be there my son explained that the room was a gift from me and obviously he would not have my card they said they needed it to cover a damage deposit and room service he said well i can do that with my card but they wouldn't have it so in the end they had to pay for it again on their card and they said they would refund my money which they had already had for 4 weeks after all this which took approximately an hour they then said the room wasn't ready and they then had to wait another hour before they could go in the room

Name: Ben
Review_title: Hotel building creaks in the wind!
Positive: #1 problem = All floors of guests were complaining about noisy creaking / banging during the night. When we complained to the duty manager he admitted they regularly get complaints and it’s “because of the wind”. Yes I know, crazy right? This is meant to be a high end hotel chain - the building quality is too cheap and unfortunately it is impossible to sleep in winter / rainy / windy conditions. I won’t be visiting again
Negative:
1) the building is so cheap that it shakes and creaks in the wind. We didn’t sleep at all because it was so noisy - even with ear plugs! Apparently this is a fundamental problem with the cheap building construction and the wind affects all floors (We were on the 5th floor). We asked other guests at breakfast and everyone had the same complaint. The building quality is too cheap and not fit for purpose. V disappointing
2) hotel breakfast was standard 3 star quality. It was fine but nothing special
3) no bath in the room and the “extra large bed” in the studio suite was just a normal sized bed. Nothing special
4) smart TV only works with android phones. Not compatible with firestick or chromecast 
I won’t be visiting again. I rate it as a basic 3 star hotel.

Name: Abby
Review_title: Ok. Adequate but nothing special for the price.
Positive: Kettle didn’t work. Breakfast £25 each extra- very Poor value!

Name: Philip
Positive: View across to London city was pretty amazing.
Negative: Noise from plumbing / air conditioning like a high pitched Hoover was constant all night which made restful sleep Impossible.

Name: Grace
Positive: Bedroom was clean. And hotel was nice in general
Negative: The man at reception told us that the breakfast was £5 which we was happy with. The next day £50 had been taken out of our account and when we called to see why they told us that the breakfast was £25 each (I had some egg, 2 sausages and a coffee) which I don’t think is worth £25

Name: Amelia
Positive: Location was good and room was spotless
Negative: Staff! Room next door we’re playing music from 12 - 5:30 am!!!! I rung reception and complained at 2:30 am when complaining at check out they asked if I had kept ringing and complaining through the night ? I was trying to sleep and my partner had to work early in the morning !!! All they offered me was a 2x drinks voucher for their cafe!! Also room service is very very overpriced and not very nice we paid £63 for 2x breakfast which was cold once again they wasn’t interested in my complaints

Name: Charlotte
Positive: The beds were very comfortable and the room was lovely
Negative:
Being woken up by the made at 9.30 knocking on the door as we were only staying one night would have been nice for them to check If we was checked out or not. 
Also the breakfast wasnt amazing for the money paid for the room I would expect a breakfast to be cooked fresh not hot food buffet. 
Also the bathroom being in a fish tank so everyone can see you in the room wasnt my idea of a good time and even with the privacy button pushed you could still see

Name: Cheung
Positive: Room was nice and clean, staff were friendly
Negative: Poor value for money, didnt even include gown, pool and gym a bit small but sauna was nice. Breakfast was nice though.

Name: Chris
Positive: The top floor bar is definitely worth a trip, 0ffers great views of the London skyline. Also, breakfast is served the floor below with a very good spread of food, makes for a great start to the day!
Negative: Rooms are ok in their design for a 4* hotel, not poor by any means, but definitely nothing special

Name: Sara
Positive: Rude lady staff in ground floor coffee shop. I complained in reception.

Name: Antonis
Review_title: Could be a lot better if managed more effectively.
Positive: The room was big and spacious with a nice view, nice armchair and big tv. The bed was very comfortable.
Negative: Understaffed and long unsatisfying/ unnecessary waiting lines for breakfast. Room accessories were missing (sleepers) and wasn't able to communicate via phone (nobody answered neither did they called back). Additionally, bathroom accessories (toilet paper, bodywash & shampoo were kept to the minimum, enough for only 1 person, not for the 2 persons for which I had booked). Bathroom sink brought up a bad smell when used. Maybe a drain problem.

Name: Majda
Positive: Good location.
Negative: I stayed there twice before and liked it. But the service this time was very basic and we paid our night 409 with no breakfast and no slippers in the room. The tv is not compatible with iPhone. Nothing was done to make our stay better. Quite disappointing.

Name: Tobias
Positive: Despite ultimately spending a lovely New Years with my partner, when we checked into our ‚superior double bedroom suite’, we were underwhelmed to say the least. Compared to other hotels we‘d visited, we didn‘t feel like we‘d discovered a great value for money. We felt the room was small and that there was little to no effort put into the preparation of our room. We didn’t get bath robes, although we saw several people wearing some on the premises (when we asked staff where to find some, nobody knew), no conditioner, no cutlery; and once I addressed this to reception, they really didn’t seem too bothered and brushed it off... On the plus side, the swimming pool and sauna facilities were lovely.

Name: Shaunna
Review_title: View from the room good but that unfortunately doesn't make up for rude poorly trained staff
Positive: View from the room was incredible
Negative: Staff are rude & don't communicate properly, pool & gym are small, rooms do not have any extra amenities, shower cap, hand soap ect

Name: Olivia
Positive: Staff were lovey and attentive. Great views
Negative: Pool facilities are nothing like photos advertised

Name: Angela
Positive: More vegan options required at breakfast. Also ensure the food is hot, the beans were stone cold.

Name: Louisa
Review_title: No good for access to the o2.
Positive: Staff were lovely. Rooms were clean and spacious. Lifts were fast!
Negative:
We were charged £63 for breakfast which included a tray charge AND service charge and then asked if we wanted to leave a tip! By the time we sorted it out, the breakfast was cold.
We stayed at the Novotel as we were attending a concert at the o2. It was only when we were due to leave for the concert that we were told it was a half hour taxi journey with cost £27! We may as well have stayed central!
It's pushing it to refer to the swimming pool and sauna as a spa. Surprising that there were no dressing gowns provided, given the facilities.

Name: Huijun
Positive: The staff is quite helpful.
Negative: Some one always took my room key out from the switch after I went out for explore , result in no light and no air conditioning is on when I am back .

Name: Jenny
Positive: Fast lift (but queue). Comfortable bed. Nice staff. Good media facilities including USB sockets. Fabulous views.
Negative: Stained carpet in room. No disposable slippers so bare feet on (smelly) carpet walked on by previous guests. Yuk. Stains on "clean" towels. Dirty cups on tray in room. No shower cap. No dressing gown. Loo seat up with other evidence it had been used by an unknown man. No extra blanket in room (which was chilly despite turning heating up to 23. ) Worst of all probably was the disgusting smell of sewage emanating from the plug holes in the bathroom area. Housekeeping generally left a lot to be desired.

Name: Antonios
Positive:
Nice view and helpful staff. Close to canary wharf tube station (which is very busy at peak times).
Nice bar/coffee place at the 38th floor and nice pool at the basement.
Negative:
For an "executive suite", it's very small and in bad/dated condition. Dirty sofa/chair, mould in the bathroom, cracks in the walls/ceiling.
Not worth it.

Name: Colin
Positive: Good atmosphere and good bar and restaurant on the top floor
Negative:
Allocated an accessible room and had to be asked to be moved. 
Bit pricing for the quality of the room and the location from the city centre

Name: Mohammed
Review_title: Potential for excellence, let down by poor cleaning of bathrooms!
Positive: Nice views, large TV, good WiFi, great location. Bed was comfortable.
Negative: Hotel was decent, definitely not a 9.0. shower head was dirty, peeling paint in shower, sink dirty. Some tissue stuffed in a hole in the bathroom. My card has been replaced by my bank so the original payment card was thrown away, but had to still repay for the room and wait a week for a refund.

Name: Alfred
Positive: Breakfast and the views
Negative: The Reception staff was extremely rude and arrogant - when telling him this he made sure we had worst room in hotel 1105 - aircon not working Shower taking 10 min to warm bright lights from working site outside. His name was Danilo he really spoilt our stay.

Name: Vivian
Review_title: Still my preference over the Hilton. Like the modern feel and the rooftop restaurant & fab breakfast
Positive: I stay here for work and enjoy it with the breakfast (preferred that they are serving coffee at table rather than self serve at machine which was the case during my prior trip) and when lucky, a room with a view.considerate as said I was with aged parent so provided an accessible room. Shame with the construction next door as walk to the wharf not pleasant.
Negative: Asked for twins bed but when I got to the room it was a double. That said, it was swiftly fixed.

Name: Hussnain
Positive: Nothing

Name: Alexander
Positive:
Good and friendly reception team.
Relatively good price to value ratio.
Negative:
Construction works obstruct both access and views from rooms.
Despite hotel newness room has visible signs of wearing (eg peeling paint in bathroom, towel holder hanging askew).
Bed not comfortable, mattress and linen did not give sense of freshness.
Food. If late (>8pm) you’ve got problems: cafe on first floor can not offer anything besides coffee while service at the bar on 37 floor is sluggish and food choice is narrow, Tesko express can help though ...

Name: Bettina
Positive: I pre paid the room and yet when my sons arrived to the hotel they were asked to show the credit card or pay the room up front. They paid the room and now I’m wondering if I will get the credit - highly unacceptable and last time that I Will ever Per pay a room. How Can Booking.com accept this ??

Name: Simone
Positive: The hotel was clean and the staff were very friendly with exception to the chef serving breakfast who was a bit of a grump. Considering what I paid for one night and the fact the hotel boasts 4 stars it would have been nice to have a dressing gown and slippers to visit the pool area in but I was informed this was for deluxe rooms only. Some conditioner in the room would have been nice to accompany the shampoo and accessible water in the pool area along with some more lounge type seating (there were just the two swing seats so no one else knew where to put towels or where to sit if they werent in the pool) would have made it a little more comfortable but all in all a good stay. Views from the restaurant were amazing but advisable to book prior to your stay if you wish to eat in the evening as it was fully booked when we arrived. Breakfast was good but the cooked breakfast could have been a little hotter as it was cold by the time I returned to my seat. If I'm honest I probably wouldnt return as it was missing those little extras but would certainly reccomend it for a short stay. Also worth noting there are a lot of road works and construction in the area which made it difficult to access the DLR.

Name: Casper
Positive: Nice view

Name: Nathalie
Review_title: it was good but not as good as two years ago!
Positive: We enjoyed our room and the wellness space.
Negative: We didn't like our receptionist that wanted to charge us 15 pound extra for basic amenities like a bath robe. The fruit salad at breakfast was overtime, the juices weren't fresh as well...

Name: Garth
Review_title: A pleasant surprise overall. Value for money for once.
Positive:
Bokan the restaurant on the 37th floor. Food and service exceptional to say nothing of the views.
We were also given a corner room so had views in two directions.

Name: Martin
Positive: Aircon noisy room tiny bathroom tiny few towels - really poor for Novotel

Name: James
Review_title: Nice hotel but could run better
Positive:
Location great if you need to be in Canary Wharf!
Views back over London from the restaurant were excellent.
Negative:
The organisation and general running could have been smoother. 
For example, at peak breakfast time, 4 lifts open out into a narrow corridor where people are queueing to get a table for breakfast and others to get back into the lift. 
Likewise, it’s self-service coffee but with only 1 machine for the whole of the breakfast serving. This again causes queues which run in front of where other people are trying to serve themselves breakfast. 
The mains power to our room also went off twice causing us to ring reception and wait for someone to come and flip it back on (which they did promptly)- I’m assuming this was a temporary problem though!

Name: Stephen
Positive: Quite a stylish hotel and friendly staff
Negative: Shower head fixed position and set too low for me. Breakfast items had been standing a while - the bacon was like cardboard. Since my last stay a weird window had been added to the bathroom, it could be obscured with a switch, but I could see no reason for it being their in the first place.

Name: Christopher
Review_title: Not the best but not the worst.
Positive:
Location was great,
Rooms were a decent size and layout was nice
Staff were great par from one
Negative:
Bed felt like it had crumbs in it and not made very well. 
Breakfast was cold, so I asked for a new one. They microwaved a breakfast and gave it to me. 
When I left half of my breakfast as it was soggy due to being microwaved. One of the staff (a short black man with short hair) shook his head and said you havent even eaten any of it and questioned me leaving being very rude in the process. I looked back when walking upstairs and he was bad mouthing me to other members of staff. Other than that particulat gentleman, the staff were amazing.

Name: Lee
Positive: Upgrade to suit at £308 and it was so noise we didn’t sleep

Name: Ah
Positive: We were on the 16th floor and the view was really nice
Negative:
Too far from a lot of things 
The breakfast did not taste too good, not many choices for a vegan.

Name: Takashi
Positive: Room is clean and bigger than normally found in London. Staffs are generally nice.
Negative: Room make up - often miss to fill the amenities used up.

Name: Melody
Positive:
Location was good 
Modern hotel 
Nice roof top bar
Negative:
Had to wait in a queue for breakfast 
Food was poor at lunchtime 
Had to queue for the coffee machine

Name: Jane
Positive: The hotel generally.
Negative:
I paid upon arrival with cash.
I said, I would also be paying for any food/drinks etc.
Despite that, i was still asked for a £50 deposit each (2 people) which would be returned the following morning.
Upon checking out I was told the deposit would be refunded within 2 day's.
Having paid cash upon arrival & that i would pay for any food/drinks. I did not appreciate having to pay a £50 x 2 deposit.
If that is their practice, when receiving cash upon check in, they need to review it.

Name: Alex
Review_title: Good Room, Bad view and Fair Price
Positive: Enjoyed the roof bar, especially the view from the top. Tim during dropping our bags off was extremely nice and polite. the room services arrived earlier than expected and the food was delicious.
Negative: Danilo was a bit of a dick when dealing with an issue regarding my 17-year-old girlfriend's check-in, this could've been avoided if they sent an email requesting permission prior to check-in. The view from the room was especially underwhelming since the window was too small, there was no toilet brush to deal with 'skids'.

Name: J
Room_stayed: Superior Double Room with City View
Review_title: Would have expected much better service we
Positive: Location/ views
Negative: Would have expected much better service....

Name: Stephen
Positive: Breakfast on 37th floor. Restaurant was extremely good on the Saturday

Name: Matilda
Positive: Restaurant and bar made the property!
Negative: Room cleansers didn’t add new towels and left dirty cups!

Name: Diana
Positive:
The Bar on the roof top was nice lovely views over London, the only nice thing about the hotel.
The staff member that changed our room during our stay I have to say was very professional and accommodating.
Negative:
The rooms are not sound proof so you can hear the people banging and playing music and shouting from the room above us. You can also hear the showers being used, and also the toilet when flushed, not pleasant at all.
Also we left our room at 12.00 and return at 4.30 our room was still not cleaned, bed not made, although I had made it myself, and the cleaner came at 5.30 to clean the room, unbelievable, we were relaxing and told her to leave it.

Name: Robertyx
Positive: New fixtures and fittings
Negative: No Parking. Poor staff attitude, towels all over the floor and no clean towels in changing rooms. No fraught beer available. Expensive bar. Brittannia across the toad has parking, cheap drinks and friendly staff.

Name: Shell
Positive: The room itself was lovely
Negative: The check-in was a bit hectic and the rooftop was closed the day we stayed which was one of the reasons I booked this place.

Name: Anonymous
Positive: The rooms are spacious, the beds are also very comfy. Good location.
Negative: Asked for a twin room but the beds had been pushed together and unable to separate due to only one sheet. Unclear whether we would have to pay for the facilities such as the pool.

Name: Veronique
Review_title: Overall quite disappointed considering I was looking forward to my stay.
Positive: The location was good for the purpose of my trip. The staff were friendly and organised my taxis. Lovely view from restaurant.
Negative:
Very disappointed with the room. I arrived in the late evening. My bathroom sink was blocked. When I ran the tap, the sink filled with stagnant foul smelling water. I contacted reception. It was late in the evening and I wanted to settle for the night due to an important meeting the morning after. It was not appropriate to move at that time. I had to make do. This is not something I would expect from any hotel or B&B and definitely for one I paid over £200 for a night. 
Breakfast did not really have much gluten free options.

Name: Modestas
Positive: The roof top bar!!

Name: Rachel
Positive: Very modern rooms.
Negative:
Room wasn’t ready for check-in time was told would need to wait 30-60mins after 15.00 check-in for room.
Was told in the restaurant that even though booking was for 2people in executive suit, the inclusive breakfast was for 1 person only!! Really annoyed me.

Name: Aaron
Positive: The view
Negative: The doorman of the restaurant was very unfriendly.

Name: Tianjiao
Positive: The hotel locates in Canary Wharf which is a bit far from the center however the underground station is only 10mins away by walk. The reception staff is friendly and the breakfast on the 38th floor has a very nice view.
Negative: We arrived in the morning and were told the room is ready but £30 extra for an early check in which we didn’t do it. So we went out and came back at night around 11pm. Checked in and when I went to use the bathroom noticed that there were a clump of hair on the towel. There were also blood stain and body hair on the bed too. I immediately called the housekeeping and the woman on the phone seemed doesn’t understand me. I waited for 15mins no one came up so I had to call the reception asking for the person who was in charge. I then got speak to this gentleman. After I showed him the hair he explained that the hair on the towel was unacceptable that they will definitely investigate however the hair on the bed looks like the hair from someone’s arm. He asked me what he could do for me and I asked for another room which he told me “the hotel was full” without even checking or thinking. He did offer me new towel and asked if I need the bed sheet changed but at 11:30pm I just couldn’t wait any longer after spending all day out!!

Name: Kris
Positive: Room was nice and close to a couple decent restaurants. Easy walk to the tube.
Negative: Too far from downtown but an easy walk to the station and a short ride to wherever you needed to go. Also the staff wasn’t the most friendly, maybe they were just a bit short in their delivery of info.

Name: Enrico
Positive: Nice design, spacious room
Negative:
When I stayed at the hotel in the past, ataff was was more attentive than this time, but maybe because it was a busy weekend.
Also, certainly nothing the hotel can do much about, but especially on weekends the lift tends to be full of party folks headed to, or coming from the rooftop bar - which cab be a little annoying

Name: Donna
Positive: Staff were helpful and friendly
Negative: Bathroom needed some refurb ceiling was all damp. Sheet on bed had marks on it.

Name: Demmileigh
Positive: I asked for roses on the bed for arrival and the iron also burnt my boyfriends top

Name: Obaid
Positive:
1) when I arrived to the hotel I had to take my luggage to the room by my self and I had three large bags with small bags (it is my first time to experience such a thing with a hotel in this world!!)
2) I stayed in the hotel around 5 nights ,, Bed sheets were never changed
3) the location of the hotel is bad for people who wants to see London (Hyde park, harrods ..etc)

Name: Chris
Positive: The staff in both the main hotel and restaurant were rude and dismissive (all apart from one). Our welcome to the hotel felt as if we disturbed the receptionist break as we were quickly checked in with no information on where our room was, where breakfast was held, where any of the facilities are located. Our dinner at the extremely poorly run restaurant was completely ruined by the chef and waiter having a full and animated argument only 2feet from our table. Our order was not taken by the waiter who sat us instead he decided to get someone else. Our plates were left on the table for an extremely long time between courses and staff seemed upset that my partner did not enjoy the main course, at one stage rolling their eyes as they walked away. The shower in our room was not water tight and left a pool of water across the floor after each shower, there was also a brown stain on the carpet which I can only hope was not what I thought it was. Terrible hotel experience would not recommend.

Name: Nayema
Review_title: Don't waste your money, there are better hotels in central london with more facilities and cheaper
Positive: the location
Negative: staff didn't greet me and left me waiting while another couple were served before me when they came after me. I sensed a different experience due to my asian nationality. staff were more helpful to white nationality.

Name: Zr
Positive: Location was a 10+ minute walk to the nearest tube station.

Name: Julia
Positive: Friendly staff but not warm, just doing their job
Negative: For an expensive stay rate ; no breakfast included, full English £25 pp - how can you justify that; no teaspoons to stir coffee, only two English breakfast teabags, enough milk for one cup, view of buildings ugly (not relaxing at all)... there are better night rates with breakfast included and nicer venues in London. First few times I stayed attention to detail and inclusive rates were better... or was it just an unfortunate visit?

Name: Alexandra
Positive: The breakfast and Bokan 37/38 atmosphere and views were great.
Negative: I anticipated that there would be service on the rooftop terrace, not only the indoor restaurant. The room and pool/gym facilities were satisfactory. There was no bathrobe/slippers in the room, which for the price per night, you would expect. In terms of value, I think there are better options overall.

Name: Michael
Review_title: Nice on the outside, dark in the inside
Positive: there was a nice view about London
Negative: My room wasn’t what I have expected, the room wasn’t clean (a sanitary napkin at the wall ? ) .... and nobody takes care about it, I only received an sorry.

Name: Jeff
Room_stayed: Superior Double Room with City View
Positive: Great location. Bed comfortable. Great TV
Negative: Breakfast was very disappointing. Fruit salad was not fresh. Melon in the fruit salad was off. Whole fruit including bananas and apples were all badly bruised and not fresh. Cooked breakfast was ok but not great.

Name: Eric
Positive: Views & food
Negative: Taking payments from the wrong debit cards!!

Name: Abdulkarim
Positive: Room is nice with nice view
Negative: Swimming pool is small. Receptionists do not answer to call quickly

Name: Brett
Review_title: Cockroach horror, but resolved by night manager,
Positive: Good location
Negative: I found a huge Asian Cockroach in my bathroom. Two of the front desk staff were pretty unhelpful saying that there were no other rooms. However, the female front desk person was supportive and the Night Manager was helpful and resolved the issue (moved me to another room.)

Name: Melissa
Positive: We were woken in the middle of the night by a member of the housekeeping consistently knocking on you door to give us towels that we never requested!!

Name: Narasinga
Room_stayed: Superior Double Room with City View
Review_title: Its ok, but for leisure we need good ambience & breakfast was crowded and fully mismanaged
Positive: The room offered is very small compared to previous stay in same type of room. Very small window for viewing & room is congested.

Name: Simon
Positive:
Noise from DLR
Uncomfortable bed
Size of room

Name: Sanj
Positive: Fantastic architecture and interior design. Super chic and great view of the city. The roof top bar and restaurant is really stylish.
Negative: Guest service managers’s attitude was simply appalling. Quick to offer extras and take payment but no organisation of delivery of products led to surprise being ruined and on top of that she appeared at the door huffing and puffing. Passive aggressive, dismissive, sharp and rude. Absolutely disgraceful behaviour and completely ruined a stay that had potential to be very memorable.

Name: John
Positive: Great location clean room
Negative:
At the bar they charge 12.5percent service charge even when u go to the bar 
The tables were dirty something I wouldn’t expect when paying such high prices

Name: James
Review_title: nice hotel but a bit pricey
Positive:
expensive even without breakfast.
food looked ok though.
10 mins to tube and main bar area.

Name: Desiree
Positive:
It was a nice recently built hotel, good wifi and friendly staff. Very nice roof terrace and good breakfast.
Location convenient in Canary Wharf.
Negative:
It was very hot in the room when I arrived (26 degrees) and despite using the A/C, it was never cooler than 22 degrees, too warm at night.
There was an iron but no iron board. I was put in a disabled room without asking; probably because of this, there was flooding in the bathroom.

Name: Kyle
Positive: The view that’s about it.
Negative: Firstly when checking in we was rushed through check in to be told our room wasn’t ready anyway. We finally got to our room that night & realised the lamp next to the bed was broken so we had to have the lights on that were next to the pillows. When waking up in the morning to start the day off with a coffee we found out that the kettle was broken. I called front desk to tell them could they fix it and they said “we will send someone up”....... 30 minutes later after patiently waiting I then called again to ask what was the hold up & the reply was “ohhh have they not been yet, I will call the team to find out what the hold up is” we then again waited another 5 minutes still no knock on the door. Frustrated with the hold up I called again & had to actually ask if it was possible to get 2 coffees? Not even an offer from staff it’s like they didn’t even care (still no maintenance team on hand) finally the coffee arrived after a 45 minutes and it was literally the size of a shot of espresso (latte was requested) really wasn’t worth it. Just to top it all off I’ve arrived home today & checked my bank account for payments made & they have taken £150 out. I pre paid for the room back in April to get it cheaper then to see £150 taken out for “pre authorisation” which we didn’t know about or get told about before agreeing at check in. I had to find this out by calling the hotel to then yet again wait for a hour to get a email for reasons why and they said apparently it was only meant to be £100 & the extra £50 was “a glitch in the system” so now I have to wait 3-5 days for a refund. No phone call back to apologies just a email for me to go off & wait for my refund. Utterly shocking service for what I thought was a respectable hotel chain. I won’t be using any Accor hotels again!!

Name: Celia
Positive:
Great view,good breakfast.Bathroom was a neat use of space and slick.
Lovely pool area.
Negative: Housekeeping not efficient enough even when prompted...not enough milk in fridge and no spoons given for tea etc.Not enough bathroom wash product facilities either.

Name: Shelby
Positive: The breakfast buffet was great and the view amazing. Lovely facilities.
Negative: The cleanliness and smell of the room. The staff could have been more helpful struggled to find the breakfast ended up asking the maid as she was more helpful.

Name: Olivia
Positive: Location was great
Negative: The first room I checked in was dirty period stain on the bed the bedding was not made properly the sheets came out easily it was not made at usual hotel standard , I called reception they told me to come down stairs really someone should have come upstairs had a look and apologised there then moved us to our new room even offer complimentary drinks or something.

Name: Deborah
Positive: The staff in the rooftop bar were very rude. There was a strong smell of cannabis in the corridor to our bedroom. The bed wasn't as comfortable as other hotels in have stayed in.

Name: Ramzi
Positive: Room not clean

Name: Chris
Positive: Comfortable bed, good views, good tv
Negative: We asked for maintenance at the front desk because our suitcase handle broke, never heard anything. No welcome book or notice telling us when facilities could be used

Name: Stephen
Positive: The room and rooftop bar
Negative: High bar prices and the service charge in the bar.

Name: Monica
Positive: The Bokan restaurant and the view
Negative: There was no jacuzzi or steam room

Name: Tom
Positive:
Room service for food was good limited choices but attentive staff and quick.
Checking out was a breeze.
Negative: Check in was a painful experience even after calling days before as well as the day of arrival to confirm an early check in the room wasn't ready till after 3pm. Air conditioning would constantly reset to a warmer temperature and shut off during the day while your out and about. This caused stuffy and warm conditions when returning from a day and night out. Sound proof rooms are really not that sound proof. Restaurant wasn't used but bar is overpriced.

Name: Katie
Positive: View was amazing and loved the shower.
Negative: House keeping didn’t turn up till late afternoon, the room wasn’t really cleaned, sheets wasn’t changed and there were holes in the sheets and the curtains.

Name: Moath
Positive:
Location
Rooms 
View
Terrace
Negative:
The staffs in the 38th floor bar were so rude and unprofessional.. u feel that u r dealing with two stars hotel staffs.
I made two complains two the management without any response.
For the amount which i paid I expected better treatment.
Not recommended

Name: Hasib
Review_title: FoH and HSK departments need polishing
Positive: Swiming pool was nice. Sauna was amzing nice pool to play nice WhatsApp chat group with hotel team and the view was amazing .
Negative: Front of house team need some training they are not welcoming , grumpy as hell , not helpful . Seeing thier faces like you have to turn a mill away from them . No door in between toilet and bathroom . Pool board need level . Floor was slippery In Bathroom , found dirty pillows. Hair on the bed on the sofa , sofa was full of stains and stinked , no face towels . At last you do not want to know what was under the bed ( food , dust , bread crumps . Etc )

Name: Bethan1234
Review_title: Was OK but probably wouldn't stay again.
Positive: Breakfast in the restaurant is wonderful but when there is too many people though, they overflow into the bar, which isn't very nice as there is no service upstairs and the food has been out for a while and the chairs arn't comfy.
Negative: Cleaner damaged my belongings, and didn't come one one of the days which was frustrating, but not the worst experience.

Name: Amisticia
Positive: The room

Name: Sadie
Review_title: Outstanding bits and not up to scratch bit
Positive:
*Location, 10 minute walk to the underground 
*Roof top bar with amazing views 
*Variety of tea and coffee condiments 
*Free water and fridge 
*Really reasonably price cocktails and some original cocktail ideas
Negative:
*Both shower heads weren’t working correctly in rooms 
*Bad smell of damp in the bathroom 
*Stains on both chairs in the room and the bedding had a pale yellow colour to it
*Requested some milk cartons after an hour had to phone back again, when delivered we had to then request some more as they had only brought 4 and it takes 3 to make a decent cup of tea. 
* floor was dirty in swimming pool changing rooms, no where to put your towel, only 2 places to sit and for a big hotel had a small pool.

Name: Anna
Positive: The staff on the reception desk are so rude and dismissive. Every time I stay there, it’s like there’s an attitude that you’re lucky to be at this hotel. The service is poor. It puts me off staying at the hotel.

Name: Paul
Positive: Lift didn’t work and noise from fridge prevented sleep

Name: Helen
Positive: Dirty bedding and towels. Bed not made and no tea bags in room had to wait an hour and had to call back to get some brought up

Name: Victoria
Positive: Reception staff excellent, a lovely warm friendly and professional welcome from both Tim and Samir. Waitress at breakfast unwelcoming, abrupt, requests for hot drinks and food met with annoyance. Tatayana however most helpful made us feel very welcome nothing was too much trouble.
Negative: Breakfast - not great value for money, buffet food was cold, bland and tasteless. There is however a good variety of food available, as well as hot food fruit, cold meats, yoghurt, cereals etc.

Name: Carla
Room_stayed: Superior Double Room with City View
Positive: The view
Negative: For the price the room felt a little flat pack. No mini bar. And the staff told us we couldn’t get a drink at the rooftop bar when we checked in late but when we went up just to take a look we could.

Name: Francesca
Positive: Good location, great bar with views over London. Nice touch with bottled water in the room. Nice shower.
Negative: Had to queue to check in. Shower didn’t keep water in and flooded the bathroom. Hairdryers take ages to actually dry hair.

Name: Emma
Review_title: Good budget stay but next time deal with the drainage system
Positive: Hotel is good value for money but the drains absolutely stink!!!

Name: Amy
Positive: Liked the room, and spa area
Negative:
Staff very unhelpful 
Very rude 
Didn’t enjoy the stay

Name: Ayeshah
Positive: swimming pool was nice and clean .
Negative: Has some booking issues but because I booked via a third party no help was given by staff at Novotel which is fair enough but booking.com had a package for 2 with breakfast but when I got here it was only for one which doesn’t make sense .

Name: Rebecca
Positive:
It was very modern looking. 
Bed was extremely comfortable and loved the big windows. 
Big tv. 
Loved the fact there was a coffee shop inside the hotel! 
Staff were very friendly!

Name: Graham
Room_stayed: Superior Double Room with City View

Name: Orlando
Room_stayed: Superior Double Room with City View
Positive: The location and design
Negative: The size of the room very small no unless you get a suite it’s a waste of money

Name: Raad
Review_title: GOOD HOTEL BUT HOPED FOR BETTER
Positive: The restaurant was very good
Negative: For the cost of the hotel, I was expecting more. I have to call the reception for water as the amount in room is very little. There were no slippers or vanity set. I have to ask for all of these items. If it was a second star hotel then that was ok but I paid nearly 300 GBP for 1 night then I would expect a better service.

Name: Vasilis
Positive: The room size and bathroom.
Negative: Value for money, cleaningless and airconditioning

Name: Dean
Positive:
Could here noise from other rooms all night. 
Breakfast was disgusting

Name: Kamran
Review_title: Really poor staff but good views.
Positive: The view was amazing so was the cocktails at the bokan bar.
Negative:
Check in is rally slow and differcult. 
We booked a double room and was given a twin room. When we complained about this in reception we were lied to and that all the hotel beds are like that and they would join the beds together. However we didn’t buy that bulls**t story and after arguing for around 19 mins we asked for a refund, now somehow they have brought a double bed Friday night at 10pm. This showed that they operate dishonestly as the Room we got in the end was a double bed not two twins joined together as we originally told and that they don’t have any double beds in the hotel. We weren’t told that no double bed rooms weren’t avavilble but they don’t have double beds at all.... lol what a load of bull.

Name: Drdolly
Positive: I think there could be more options for breakfast.

Name: Theresa
Review_title: Nice stay, good hotel but expensive
Positive:
The staff were friendly and helpful
The pool facilities were good
Hotel was clean and good quality.
Would recommend
Negative:
Coach party turned up and stood in a queue to getting to lift to get to our room on 25th floor for a long time.
The food and room service was expensive to the point of obscene. Passable pizza was £12, over cooked chips from the freezer were £5. Posh names on menu for mediocre food.
I was asked to bring ID which I did but they wanted ID for my granddaughter who is 5 and travelling with me. This was not made clear on documents and requirements and if it had been , what on earth could I bring to prove our relationship, birth certificate and passport would not prove this and letter from my daughter could easily have been written by myself. For future reference what would be acceptable for this?

Name: Laura
Positive: Staff were lovely!
Negative: Overall there were no issues however, the fragrance at the front desk is very overpowering. I’m not certain why it’s needed 😬

Name: Marcel
Positive: the bed was comfortable
Negative: the water in the shower was blocked and the TV remote control did not work, even after giving the Feedback at receiption desk.

Name: Ben
Review_title: Lovely hotel, rude staff. Overall annoyed that it was ruined.
Positive: The room, the view, the facilities were good, nice rooftop bar.
Negative: The fact we had NO hot water, and it took 50 minutes to fix, which then made us over an hour late, the staff were not very understanding, didn’t really seem to care that we had plans, the house keeping kept knocking at our door at 09:45 when check out wasn’t until 12 noon and carried on knocking until we answered. Then the fire alarm went off 3 times at 11am and had no good gesture of compensation.

Name: Borhan
Positive: Room was so small, I wasn’t expect that with paying a lot of money. Indeed, u pay for the location 😩

Name: Roman
Positive: Room was way different from what we had expected to be. If you book superior room you’ll get 3* hotel room. It’s no where near as nice as photos show. Also bathroom was dirty and wall in the bathroom was shabby. We were really disappointed by this hotel. For the price paid, we expected more.

Name: Karl
Positive: Modern hotel. Nice breakfast and view from the 38th floor.
Negative:
The cleanliness of the room was so and so. You could notice that they didn't vacuum everyday. Also the bathroom amenities were a bit random. Sometimes no schampoo, but double of shower gel for example. 
Biggest concern was the booking of the NYE event where I was asked to send my reservation to an email which I yet have not received any response from. After speaking to three different staff members (at three different times) I got the message that they were fully booked about 5 hours before the event should start.

Name: Jolanta
Review_title: Nice room and internet, but breakfast wasn’t good.
Positive: Good bar and location

Name: Hatice
Positive: It was close to everything we needed

Name: Sean
Review_title: Ok stay, made that by friends
Positive: Breakfast ridiculously expensive, lifts not working properly

Name: Snhf
Positive: The rest of the staff are very nice.
Negative:
Family with more than 1kid are not allow to stay in the same room. I really have a bad experience with this hotel. Even they offer the half price for another room, I am not happy that I have to sleep separate from the kids especially the vacation trip.
I have been stay in many hotel over the world but for this hotel policy is unacceptable. I will not stay in any Novotel hotel again. 
The check in staff especially manager should have more thoughtful and more polite and may be have a bit care of customer feeling. There are a million ways how to talk and negotiated. Even in the end she help, it does not make me feel any better.

Name: Richard
Positive: Check in took half an hour, staff allowed people to jump the queue. Our room key didn't work, we waited outside the room for 20 minutes for someone to let us in (requiring 2 phone calls at 11pm to remind them we needed help). The bed was not made, the mattress protector too small and no shampoo/conditioner provided. I complained on the day, 5 days later still no acknowledgement. For £162 it was absolutely not worth it. Avoid!

Name: Paulina
Positive: The facilities that we were given were disabled facilities. Neither of us were disabled and this was very disappointing as I booked the room in November. They should’ve had a room assigned to us as I called and specified this was a birthday get away for me & my partner.

Name: Gail
Review_title: Great location, great room but poor customer service.
Positive: Customer service when checking out, staff remained on phone, took our keys and dismissed us. Still waited hor invoice!

Name: Pat20000
Positive: the view out from the restaurant was good.
Negative: bad smell from the bathroom sink, now cosmetic tissues arent filled up. Breakfast long waiting line, we decide not to wait for the breakfast. Hotel at all is overestimated!

Name: Tracey
Positive: Roof top bar

Name: Mary
Positive: Pity that we could not check-in before 15.00 to lose our bags before meeting with family at lunchtime.
Negative: Earlier check-in would be more acceptable.

Name: Abbie
Positive: The hotel was modern, it had a funky vibe and nice views.
Negative: The staff specifically emailed me previous to our stay stating that they were excited to personalise our visit. However the stay was for our anniversary and they gave us two single beds on either side of the room, even though I had already paid for a double. Disappointed as I thought they were actually going to make our stay special and instead they made it quite unpleasant.

Name: Garry
Positive: very clwan
Negative: breakfast on the day £25.00 each most hotels £10.00 over charged

Name: Charlie
Positive: It was in a good location and easy to get too
Negative: I was sat in the bedroom and then hear the shower running but when I go into the bathroom there is water running from the ceiling light onto the floor

Name: Claire
Positive: The restaurant for breakfast was excellent with a good choice.
Negative: We booked an executive room to have access to the executive lounge which didn't exist when we got there

Name: Dmitriy
Positive: Room size is very nice. Property is relatively new.
Negative: My room was several categories lower than I booked. I booked a room with floor windows but instead I had tiny windows. The room was very cold. It took a night to heat the room to a habitable temperature.

Name: Dinesh
Review_title: Lovely hotel, need more reception staff at busy times
Positive: Free upgrade with our room
Negative:
Reception staff didn't explain to us the complimentary mini bar selection and what time we could check out.
The heating in our room didn't work properly, had to wait for someone to come & then informed that someone else will come in 30 mins which they didn't.

Name: Maher
Room_stayed: Superior Double Room with City View
Positive: The bedsheets were not clean enough

Name: Karandeep
Positive: Not too far from the station and the central canary wharf area even though hotel is more isolated.
Negative: Room was not hoovered upon arrival nor the day after despite letting the front desk know. On the third day the room was not cleaned at all and when brought to the attention of staff they offered free drinks at the bar or room service but this should not have been happening in the first place. Nobody to help with luggage even though I was alone with 2 suitcases and 2 bags. Overall, it was disappointing and not worth the money. Could easily find another hotel for the same price with better services, facilities and location.

Name: Inese
Review_title: Hotel nice, staff need people training 😡
Positive: The hotel bar was amazing 😉
Negative: The staff for breakfast Iva had a face like a slapped arse, really moody, customers pay good money, and if there is a window seat, these should be available, ordered room service that never arrived.. the English of the staff is poor and I think they are rude.

Name: Dean
Positive: Yes , but I would advise them to check all lifts are operational before booking
Negative:
During our stay there was only 2 lifts out of 4 working which caused massive delays between getting between floors due to lifts being full or going straight past our floor.
This also caused issues to our friend who is pregnant and had to walk down 15 flights of stairs after the lift failed to stop on their floor after 20 mins or waiting.

Name: Marina
Positive: Friendly staff. Breathtaking views and good breakfast in the restaurant. Very comfortable bed.
Negative: Too high a price, and when I needed to extend the stay, as a result, the price for 2 nights was almost the same as for the previous 4 nights.

Name: Frequent
Positive:
Modern hotel, close to Canary Wharf station. 
Surprisingly good pillows.
Negative:
Got an allergic reaction during the night, maybe because of the air conditioning(?).
You need to queue for the breakfast.
No body lotion or hair conditioner.

Name: Chern
Positive: The room is spacious and the bed was very comfortable.
Negative: I was looking forward to having a bath tub but was instead given the room with disabled washroom with shower

Name: Jacques
Positive: not at all
Negative: the personal was veryunpolite unfriendly hypocrite because they look at us outside appareance ...racial desrimanation

Name: Ewelina
Review_title: The hotel is overrated won't even mention the pooh in the sauna toilets
Positive: The airconditioning
Negative: The staffs approach and the fact that receptionist tell lies and think you're an idiot

Name: Ross
Positive: Staff were rude didn't like anything

Name: Sunisa
Positive:
I like the location of this place.
I like the breakfast.
The room was clean and i got nice view.
Negative:
I dont like the reception I came here twice they were nice before but now there a bit more aggresive.
Before they were nice women and now there are men.

Name: Uchenna
Positive: Front desk staff were helpful and professional
Negative:
The lifts were like a joke, it felt like waiting for the train.
Housekeepers were rude and didn't speak much English. On the last day,it felt like one was being hounded out the door.

Name: Benjamin
Positive: I liked the views and the rooms was okay. The hotel overall is really good I would go there again.
Negative: The English breakfast wasn't the best but it was okay. The first day we order it had more quantity and the next day less. Swimming pool and gym was too small. One staff in Bokan was rude by kicking us out of the bar area. Apart from that it's a really nice hotel

Name: Imad
Positive: The view

Name: Kay
Positive: The view
Negative: I paid for the deluxe room on the 32nd floor and I got no toothpaste until I called to ask for it, no soap until I called to ask for it, and the room service line was always busy when me or my wife would ring it. Also Break fast as included in my package but the lady said they'll charge me. I wasn't happy with the service.

Name: Mariam
Positive: The facilities were really good, room was nice, overall really good stay
Negative: Had to ask 4 times for room service to be done, when asking cleaners had slight attitude

Name: Martin
Positive: This hotel is not suitable for children at all(specially the swimming pool ) , the “executive lunch” (for suite’s rooms)is not exist there is a place with coffee machine (which was broken ) the soft drinks are looked on the fridge and nothing more! Positive: The hotel is good, had great decor. The restaurant on the 37 and 38 floor has a stunning view of the city. The pool is nice and clean. The hotel location is also very good being close to the train stations.

Its either the staff assumes non-caucasian have low standards, or bookings.com took the big portion of the pie, and hence the hotel gave us the less desired rooms. There was no shower gel, and the cafe served us too small pizza for 12 GBP a piece that wasn't even cooked properly. The hotel has no car park which makes it painful for people who drives.
